Be careful of the optical cable connection. We've lost sound a few times and it was the optical cable that popped out.
209.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

210.author: HokieCate
210.review:
First of all I was blown away by the price. A Bose sound bar for under $250? I had to ask the salesman who was helping us 3 times to make sure that price was right! We got it for a small living room and the sound is beautiful,. The bar is nice and compact so it doesn't take up much space and the set up was very easy.
If you're looking for a great sound bar without spending a fortune, I highly recommend taking a good look at this one, it won't disappoint.
210.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

211.author: papaguns42
211.review: I bought this speaker because the speakers on my television set was hard to hear clearly at times. Also I didn't want a subwoofer. One, it helps with being able hear dialogue more clearly. Two, it was easy to set up. Three, the size makes it easy to place in front of the television on the tv stand( I can move it to other locations when needed). Four, I like being able to connect my bluetooth devices to listen to music. And last, it's Bose.
211.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

212.author: SnillocA
212.review: I love Bose products. The headphones and mini speaker work great so I thought for sure the sound bar would exceed expectations. Unfortunately, it’s not that great. There’s one setting that allows you to have less background noise and hear the voices better, and if you want to change the bass then you’re gaging it with flashing white dots. Really bummed with this Bose product.
212.recommend: No, I would not recommend this to a friend

213.author: Newbie
213.review: Majority of my audio devices are bose. I received a soundbar for Christmas that wasn't that great and paired with everything except my tv. In my heart I knew I wanted a soundbar and I wouldn't settle for anything less than a bose. The universal remote that came with it paired with my tv and cable box within min. The setup was really easy because it came with an optical cord. One cord that can only go in one port one way. You can't mess it up.
213.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

214.author: Loosenut58
214.review:
If you are looking for an nice improvement over your tv sound and you do not have a lot of space then you will like this sound bar. It doesn’t come with a sub but it does provide good surround. It has excellent clarity does manage to hit decent lows just don’t expect ground shaking notes a sub would provide. 
An added bonus is the Bluetooth capability.
214.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

215.author: Moxie1836
215.review_title: Bose Solo 5 Soundbar; good for what it is
215.review:
No frills small footprint sound bar, Decent quality sound; significantly better than small speakers in flatscreen..
I do not like that there are no controls on the sound bar and that the remote control is required for all functions. Could not satisfactorily program the Bose remote such that it could replace my ATT Uverse remote. I would provisionally recommend this.
215.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

216.author: Happygifter
216.review_title: For Voice clarity it is fabulous a 5 music a 4.
216.review: This is Fabulous for Voice clarity which is why I got this but if you are a music aficionado you will want something that has a separate base unit. This was a Gift for someone who is hearing challenged. I listened to a lot of sound bars listening to the same thing. Bose had the best speech clarity and that was what I was after. The music sounds very good too but you also don't have any control of your sound quality levels.
216.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

217.author: Chris
217.review: Purchased this yesterday from a local Best Buy and I’ve been blown away at the sound coming out of this small of a speaker. Highly recommend for streaming music from your phone to it. My only complaint (and I think it’s something I’m doing wrong) is hooked up to a tv for audio it doesn’t seem to get nearly as loud as playing through Bluetooth
217.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

218.author: Tecky1961
218.review: I had been looking for a soundbar for my HD TV (40" Samsung.) I didn't have room for a big system with floor size bass, etc. I told the Best Buy worker what I was looking for...a great sounding soundbar that was small and compact. He took me right to the Bose soundbar and let me hear it. With their reputation, I bought it and have been extremely happy with it. Great movie sound, great live sports sound. Great choice!
218.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

219.author: Myan
219.review: I had confidence going into my purchase because of the brand of the product. The 250 dollar price range wasn't too much more than many of the other sound bars but again you're not getting the Bose quality with those other brands. It was set up very simply and the controls and pairing were equally as simple. Only con for me would be how long it takes to turn the volume up or down. Though I can't tell if it allows for a more accurate desired volume.
219.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

220.author: Mark
220.review: Sound bar is pretty good but not as good as expected. The smart remote that came with it is an IR so it has to be pointed at all equipment that it controls. Satellite box is on a lower shelf in bedroom and the sound bar and TV are mounted higher up on the wall. I have to point the remote at the satellite box and then swoop up to get the TV and sound bar to turn on or off.
220.recommend: No, I would not recommend this to a friend

221.author: tattooed
221.review:
I bought a new toshiba 50" tv and wanted to get a sound bar to enhance the sound so I read the reviews on this one. I am very happy with it's performance. It is not a powerful sound bar but that's not what I was looking for.

I have bad hearing and it has a mode that allows you to enhance the speech of all programs and that is just what I needed.

Very easy to set up and the remote is the best universal remote that I have ever had.
221.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

222.author: Hughes
222.review_title: Definitely better than the TV speaker
222.review: It does what I wanted it to do...the vocal button allows dialog to come through loud and clear...If you want surround sound, build a theater room...otherwise, this fills a master bedroom just fine...I was a BOSE hater...1st BOSE I've ever purchased...apparently, they make good sound bars :)
222.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

223.author: TLSchwa
223.review_title: Gives the sound boost I needed!
223.review:
Hooked it up to my TV system to supplement a Bose surround system which never really worked well for dialogue and talk show programming. My existing speakers (5) are on the wall near the corners and behind the viewer. 
This sound bar has a special setting for dialogue that sharpens the sound and adds great clarity as well as a nice directional sound at listening level slightly in front and below the screen. Love it.
223.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

224.author: mikesbiken
224.review:
Purchased less than a year ago. Sounded great when it worked. Then it occasionally would not turn on with the TV which required taking it off the wall, unplugging it, then plugging it back in to get it to work again. Very annoying! Over time it quit working more and more frequently. Today it quit working altogether.

Very frustrated that I paid $250.00 for this thing and it completely failed in less than a year!
224.recommend: No, I would not recommend this to a friend

225.author: oregon45
225.review: Really happy with my purchase of this sound bar. Not made for large rooms where a lot of wattage is needed, just doesn't have much power. It is amazing in my bedroom. Perfect match in small bedrooms. Has great clarity..acoustic instruments sound awesome and voices are so clear that you'd think they are in the room. Very easy to install with optical cable and looks to be of great quality...looks like it will last a 100 years. Good buy.
225.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

226.author: Mike34
226.review_title: Pound for pound the best sound!
226.review: Finally! There are many sound bar/woofer combinations available for improving and enhancing TV sounds. They are large, bulky, have many pieces and are in general too cumbersome. BOSE Solo 5 incorporates the bass into a single piece that connects easily, doesn't take much space, and provides the highest quality sounds, dialog, music that you can ask for! Simplicity is best!
226.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

227.author: Jkins
227.review: Just bought a Sony E800 4K TV and I love it BUT the sound is poor because of small speakers doe to thin profile. Needed a sound bar to produce better sound. Thought about Bose and boy was I right. Great sound for a small bar; no subwoofer to contend with yet bass is commendable. Durability? Don’t know yet, but the unit is aluminum, not plastic, so it will probably be solid for the long run.
227.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

228.author: Herbie63
228.review: I bought this for my Uncle. He usually watches a few shows, but he loves baseball season. Now he he is legally blind, so sound means a lot to him. The first game we watched, he was blown away. He said the sounds were richer, but the main thing was that he was hearing sounds that the TV speakers weren’t picking up. The look on his face was priceless. This speaker is great.
228.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

229.author: Mellie
229.review: Love the dialogue mode on this sound bar; it's why I ended up purchasing this particular model. I use the feature all the time. It helps me to hear the words when I'm watching without getting drowned out by a lot of bass or background noise. I now notice when I'm watching a tv that lacks this feature as I have more difficulty hearing and have to increase the volume.
229.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

230.author: Phil
230.review:
I like the portable size I could carry it to meeting or party to play music. The clear and crystal sound is true and like 3D. However, if it can run on battery then it would be perfect.
The universal remote control can replace the Tv, BD DVD, cable box and Game that impresses me a lot. How much I hate ATT Uverse cable box then the more I love Bose remote control
230.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

231.author: Victorino
231.review_title: The Perfect Soundbar for a 42 inch TV & Under
231.review: I highly recommend this sound bar for a person that lives in a apartment or wants it in their bedroom. I love the clarity and it’s perfect for the price! You can tell the difference when you turn the soundbar off and have the audio from your tv. A must and worthy investment for people who have a 42 inch tv and under! I guarantee you, you’ll enjoy Movies,games, and Tv Shows!
231.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

232.author: farm2k
232.review_title: Perfect supplement to a smaller TV
232.review: So many sound bars are either super large or super expensive, which is why I was so glad I found this one. We needed a less-wide bar with decent sound and this worked perfectly! Sounds infinitely better than the built-in TV sound, yet doesn't overwhelm the counter it rests on. Perfect for our use-case and perhaps perfect for yours as well....
232.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

233.author: Jason48
233.review_title: Solo 5 is a great product for the money
233.review: I bought this to use in there garage. It is perfect for improved TV audio quality while also allowing Bluetooth connection to stream audio. The quality of sound for its small size and features is well worth the money. If you are looking for something to improve audio for garage, patio, apartment, etc. where you need better sound without big bass this is a great option.
233.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

234.author: KofNJ
234.review:
I recently purchased the Bose Solo 5. I am very pleased with the sound quality and the great remote control that accompanied the Solo 5. The fact that it is programmable to control the TV, the cable box, DVD Player, and one more auxiliary device is awesome...
The only negative of the Bose Solo 5 (keeping me from giving it 5 stars) is the volume limitations, 25% more volume would make it perfect...
234.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

235.author: frenchie2u
235.review: I bought the Bose soundbar because I bought a new TV and wanted to have that "loved" Bose sound(I have a Bose Acousticwave doublestack and Bose companions 2) and love them, I was expecting the same with the soundbar, let me just say that the speakers on the TV was louder and cleaner than the Bose, my opinion, stay away from this soundbar.
235.recommend: No, I would not recommend this to a friend

236.author: Frankie
236.review: I bought this sound bar after reading the reviews and because it's BOSE. It's exactly what I expected for the price. Great sound and clear voice with some bass that fits the room my TV is in. A big improvement over just the TV speakers. Don't expect the full surround sound of a bigger system, but if all u are looking for is an improvement of your TV speakers, this is it. Great sound at a great price. Bose will never let u down.
236.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

237.author: Merle
237.review: The acoustics in my family room are a challenge due to the peaked ceilings. I would have to turn my sound up so high st times, which was annoying to anyone on the 2nd floor of my house. This sound bar does an excellent job of directing the sound back towards those in the room. It has greatly enhanced our viewing experience. The only thing missing for me is something that would designate the volume level, but that's minor.
237.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

238.author: iRetired
238.review: No we do NOT work for Bose, but I wish one of us did as we have purchased so many Bose products and paid full price for all of them. We have two Bose headphones, on ear and in ear. We own two sets of Bose computer speakers, and since we have 3 TV's we have 3 Bose systems. This one is good for a smallish room ie a bedroom. Works perfectly and I especially like the way you can push the button to lower the base and enhance the speech.
238.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

239.author: arizonagal
239.review: Of course, Bose products are the best, but this is an excellent choice for a lower end speaker. The sound is incredible and is perfect for the summer home we rent. And the best part is I get to take it home at the end of the season and use it at home! Can't wait to hear the sound on a larger TV which I will wall mount along with the speaker. Kudos to Bose for thinking of those of us with smaller budgets!
239.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

240.author: MsMandy
240.review: The Bose sound bar has amazing sound! It’s sleek, and fits nicely in front of the tv. The only down side is if you use the factory remote be prepared to get your gaming thumbs ready. You have to press the button so many times to turn it up or down. Pressing and holding it down doesn’t work either. Even with that being said I would still definitely recommend this product to friends and family
240.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

241.author: Taina
241.review: After reading the reviews I hesitated purchasing this Bose sound bar, but bought it anyway. This Bose is disappointing in sound, missing base, etc. There are cheaper ones that sound better, but I purchased because of ease of installation, however, still unable to link it with my other remotes. I will use it in a bedroom and probably purchase a Sonos when able to.
241.recommend: No, I would not recommend this to a friend

242.author: Benny195
242.review_title: Good option for a lower priced soundbar
242.review: We bought this to get better sound than just the TV speakers and to make the dialog easier to be understand. It works well on both counts and fills our needs. It does not give home theater quality sound. It was easy to connect to our Samsung smart TV. The universal remote is great. We can do everything with it including accessing the streaming services that we use. We don't use the TV's remote at all.
242.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

243.author: TjSchirlls
243.review: Excellent quality sound bar so easy to attach to the TV and has improved the sound quality 100% for my Sony Bravio TV. That had A complete surround sound system that is now being used with another TV but I missed the quality sound with this TV so this sound bar was the perfect and least expensive fix For the quality that Bose provides
243.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

244.author: JohnSC
244.review_title: Bose Solo 5 is a Compact Unit
244.review:
I was looking for a sound bar with a small foot print since I did not have a lot of space. I did not want a unit with a sub-woofer. The sound quality on the Solo 5 if only fair. When you raise and lower the sound volume there is no display bar on the unit or the TV, as a result I it is hard to adjust the volume.
I would only recommend this unit if you did not have the necessary space for a full sound bar with a sub-woofer.
244.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

245.author: IamGroot
245.review: This sound bar has definitely enhanced our TV sound. Since our TV is wall mounted it didn't give off the best sound especially dialogue. The Bose definitely gives us better dialogue and just overall better sound. We now don't feel like we have to blast the TV speakers to understand everything going on. The Bluetooth feature to stream music from our phones is also a definite plus.
245.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

246.author: BlackCatOne
246.review: The Bose 5 TV sound system works well with my 50 inch plasma TV. I wanted a system that had crisp sound but also reasonable base. I live in an apartment so it is compact, has great sound and doesn't share my experience with all my neighbors. It is a bit pricey but well worth it. Movies have good fidelity and there is no problems with news shows. You can hear the dialog - it is not fighting with music to be understood.
246.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

247.author: JPMD
247.review: I recently purchased a new flat screen tv and needed to also upgrade my soundbar. I chose Bose because they're known for their quality sound. I really like the size of the soundbar, it's small and produces high quality sound. I would highly recommend this soundbar to anyone looking to enhance their flat screen tv sound.
247.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

248.author: DMONYC
248.review_title: Sound quality good, but remote annoying
248.review: The sound quality is very good, but it is very annoying that you cannot pair the cable remote to the device. so that results in multiple remotes. Maybe there is a way to do it (and its not making the bose the main remote, because it does not have all the features as the cable remote), but it is not obvious or intuitive.
248.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

249.author: brock275
249.review: Purchased separate audio equipment w/sub, then found the setup just too loud across the house. Returned everything and bought the Bose. It really makes my movie experience just right. My TV remote also controls it. Keep in mind this isn't a solution for concerts/music - just great for TV. Music is OK, but you're really going to want appropriate gear for that.
249.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

250.author: BSHullabaloo
250.review_title: Solid sound, but with some hiccups
250.review: The sound on the bar is great; fills a room without the need for multiple speakers (extra helpful when you want a full sound without thumping bass that would wake a sleeping baby). However, it has some issues with our TV, often shutting off when the TV goes on. Not a deal breaker, and setting it to auto-wake makes that happen less frequently.
250.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

251.author: RELRRT
251.review: This is am excellent sound bar if your looking for an upgrade to replace your TV factory speakers. Having been a Bose customer for almost 20 years this little bar delivers great sound for the price. If your looking for true surround sound you may want to consider one of the top of the line Bose systems. Eventually I'm going to upgrade to the Lifestyle 600.
251.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

252.author: Billbuffalo
252.review: Huge universal remote that is not universal. I have a new Samsung TV and Time Warner cable box. It took forever to get them programmed and still not working right. The remote will not turn the TV and cable box on and off, no matter how many times I follow the directions. So now I am stuck with two large remotes. I guess universal doesn't really mean universal. Very disappointed.
252.recommend: No, I would not recommend this to a friend

253.author: tomsvideo
253.review_title: Bose Solo 5 TV Sound clarifies voice
253.review: Voice audio in clarification enabled after very simple setup. Make sure your purchase includes universal remote. Other seller do not include. Remote truly easy setup with TV, DVR and DVD. If your audio preference is not booming bass, loud explosions but clear voice with diminished background music/ noise - this should be your choice. Especially good for TVs with screens less than 50".
253.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

254.author: Yankeessuck9
254.review: I have had multiple Bose systems from lifestyles to headphones ALL have been outstanding this sound bar is no different, some will complain that Bose equipment is not loud enough but that’s the difference between listening to noise and sound if you don’t understand what that means then you are listening to noise and probably need Bose anything or you can’t be helped
254.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

255.author: OR67
255.review: Besides great sound reproduction, the Bose speaker comes with an easily programmable universal Bose remote that is useful for controlling all components. We loved our first Bose speaker so much we headed back to Best Buy the very next day to purchase a second Bose speaker. We love the Bluetooth capability. The quality of the Bose sound is EXCEPTIONAL!!
255.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

256.author: frheel9
256.review: I got this to use with my computer system because it's smaller and I could mount it with my monitors. The sound is great. A few bummers: It doesn't have a power button, have to use the remote; can't use digital audio and control the volume in computer (you can using bluetooth connection). Obviously it wasn't designed to be used with computers, but it still does pretty good.
256.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

257.author: Sunmatic
257.review: Well my bose solo 5 TV soundbar hasn't worked since I bought it home and configured my system??? The green indicator light was on about 2 days with no sound then it just died. It could be that I made a mistake configuring the system? I have been over how to run the cables to and from each piece of equipment but I have a feeling this isn't good at all.
257.recommend: No, I would not recommend this to a friend

258.author: jnojag
258.review: This sound system provides fantastic sound that Bose is known for. It is very limited in that it does not have a subwoofer. Also, if you are using a more basic television, it might not have inputs needed to get the best sound. It does, though, have bluetooth for other devices to connect. Overall, I am very happy with the value for the money.
258.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

259.author: Tim442
259.review_title: A lot of bang for the buck!
259.review: Bose does it again. I was not sure about getting this one because of the size. Bose is so good at bringing out big sound from small speakers and boxes. Sits on my fireplace mantle under my Sony 75” with room for cable box and Blueray player. The sound fills the room. Universal remote linked easily to tv,cable box and Blueray. Very pleased!
259.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

260.author: matt
260.review: i needed a soundbar that wasn't four feet long to fit on the shelf I have. For the best audio experience you should have the speaker(s) at the same height as your ears when youre listening. With that being said , the size of this solo 5 worked perfectly. It makes the dialogue so much clearer and music sounds great as well in bluetooth mode. Hope it lasts, I've only had the unit for 2 months.
260.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

261.author: Sengin
261.review: My Bose soundbar is great for me. It's not to loud but loud enough to give my TV that extra push to get a cinematic sound for movies and watching sporting events that make my living room come to life with the full richness of sound experience. I am very happy with this and look forward to buying a bigger and better Bose sound system.
261.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

262.author: Webstar
262.review: This Bose sound bar is just the right size and provides very good quality sound for my guest bedroom. I have owned Bose sound systems before and have enjoyed them all for many years after purchase. I recommend this product to anyone in the market for a compact quality sound system for their TV.
262.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

263.author: Pete
263.review: The soundbar is easy to setup and the controller is easy to connect with other units and other controllers connect to it. The sound is very good especially the dialog mode. The only problem is that the dialog mode has to be turned on every time and the mode cannot be turned on from other controllers.
263.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

264.author: BigPumpkin
264.review_title: Bose, sound as it should be
264.review: As a hearing impaired adult I need a boost for my listening ability. Having had multiple Bose products in the past I was assured that I would not be let down. The soundbar coupled with my new TV gives me full rich sound that is not distorted in any way. I listen mostly to the news and with just plain conversation the sound is full-bodied and rich. Definitely worth the buy!!!
264.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

265.author: Rimshot65
265.review_title: Excellent source for playing high quality audio
265.review: I was looking for a replacement for my computer speakers and didn't really know if this BOSE sound bar was compatible with a computers audio output source. As it turnes out it offered 3 different interfaces of connecting audio, so this product really hit the mark. Has excellent sound quality, which I expect from a BOSE product, and also came at a great price. Can't beat that.
265.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

266.author: Cliffhanger
266.review: TV sound is usually lacking due to the placement and size of built in speakers. I was able to improve that without major cash outlay for surround sound equipment. Bose has always been a leader in sound tech, and this is no exception. You can spend more and ger more, but I was looking for simplicity. This gave me simplicity and great sound.
266.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

267.author: Notatechnerd
267.review: We have an open concept home with stained concrete floors. Our tv and the floors were not blending well, making it hard to understand clear audio. We decided on this sound bar and made an excellent decision. We have perfect sound and don’t have to turn the volume up to max volume to hear anything. We now can enjoy the tv at a resonable volume and without echos.
267.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

268.author: WaterfrontAgent
268.review: So there is no question that Bose is a great system. This is a midrange without all the woofer and speakers. For my space I don't have room to fit everything, but I do have a need to have much bigger sound than my nice TV can produce. Fits nicely in front of my TV, clean design. This was the perfect solution fo me. Sounds Bose great. Small price
268.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

269.author: ryanisthemod
269.review: I bought this Bose sound bar to make our movie watching experience better. The sound quality is very good. Im happy with the purchase. my only problem right now is trying to get the remote to turn on both the sounder and the tv at the same time right now i have to turn them on separately. I figure it out eventually. Right now this is just a First World Problem.
269.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

270.author: Jdsweb
270.review: I bought this to use with an XBOX ONE and as a supplement to my home system. Yes it lacks bass but that was expected and I already have a subwoofer. The clarity is very good and made a world of difference in my current home theater set up. I have used it for just playing some music and BOSE did a great job. I am extremely happy with the over all sound. It was worth the money!
270.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

271.author: Mathatas
271.review_title: Great Product, but has its limitations.
271.review: This is a fine "little" soundbar. And that is the key word, "little." It does not throw out enough sound in a large room. You need to step to a larger set up from Bose. Now that said, it is great for a bed room or office, or even a smaller den, provided you don't need deep, rumbling base, which it won't produce. But for a single sound bar system in the right size of room, it is outstanding!
271.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

272.author: Drbcpa
272.review: The Solo 5 TV Sound system was a perfect fit for us. The TV in our open plan kitchen, family room,dinning room area is used a lot for watching news and regular TV programming. We didn't need a surround sound system but the speakers on new TV's these days are tinny and wimpy! The Bose system is perfect with full rich sound in a compact and unobtrusive package. We love it!
272.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

273.author: Highlander
273.review: The speaker in our downstairs flat screen t.v. is in the back and projects the sound against the wall and up into the ceiling. This makes it louder in the upstairs living room . This eliminates that issue with clear Bose sound. The dialog feature enhances the voices and cuts down on background noise inherent in most movies. This compact stylish sound bar does everything we want it to
273.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

274.author: BennyMarissa
274.review: I have an older TV in my bedroom and was tired of the not so good sound coming from it. I researched soundbars in this price range and the Bose was higher up on the list of course. Sounded good in the store but it sounds even better in my room. Voices are crisp and clear and still get a good amount of bass when watching a movie. Surprised how much sound can come out of such a small soundbar.
274.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

275.author: Karygirl
275.review_title: I am satisfied but has minor issues
275.review: Always loved Bose sound systems. The solo sound bar has very good tone and clear sound. The negative is you have to reset settings for sound each time you turn TV on and off. Also sound will only reach a certain level of loudness. The regular television sound has more volume settings but lacks the better clear sound of the Bose. Happy but would not buy another smaller sound bar like this.
275.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

276.author: Dollface
276.review: I got a Hisense 4K HDTV for a ridiculously low price a year or so ago. It’s been great, except for the sound quality. So I bought us the Bose Solo-5 TV Soundbar for Christmas. It has improved our tv watching experience dramatically! It’s also great for playing music thru bluetooth, or Pandora on our Apple TV. We are VERY happy with this purchase.
276.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

277.author: pflugernate
277.review_title: Big Bose sound in a small bar
277.review:
This is exactly what you would expect from Bose. Small and compact BUT with a big sound. I went from a 3.1 sound system to this (due to living space & furniture). I was afraid that I would be missing a whole lot of sound.....
No this is no replacement for a sub But it does pack a punch for such a small unit. I love that I can stream from my iPhone to it as well.
277.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

278.author: RSee
278.review: Bought this to go along with the Sony 4K TV my dad got for Father's Day. The TV speakers were fine, but our living room is a little bigger, so the sound bar provides a great amount of sound for the space. It's compact but that does not take away from it's sound quality. We weren't looking for anything fancy, so the one piece sound bar was perfect.
278.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

279.author: Candy
279.review: This product will not deliver a theater effect. It served my purpose which was to make it easier to understand the voices on my crime shows which tend to have a lot of background noise. I was able to set it on the bookcase next to my TV, so I did not have to take the TV down and mount the sound bar. It also provided enhancement of the music channels especially the base.
279.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

280.author: Zach
280.review: I don't think this soundbar is worth the money, I have had it roughly 2 months and it seems to have already gone fuzzy when a regular tv show has some bass. I have adjusted the Bass all the way down, but it still seems to make the fuzz/rattle sound. I would expect this from a Vizio brand, but not from Bose. I actually heard a samsung that sounded much better than this one at a friends.
280.recommend: No, I would not recommend this to a friend

281.author: Laurie
281.review: We wanted clearer sound from our 52” TV. Have had other sound devices from Bose in the past, so decided to look at Bose again. A nice salesperson at Best Buy, based on my needs, led me to the Bose 5 TV Sound System. It was very easy to hook up to the TV, and it sounds just great.
281.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

282.author: Prezpfarr
282.review: Glad I purchased this and not the Samsung soundbar. Sound quality is excellent and bass is decent considering its just a soundbar and no external subwoofer. Comes with optical cable. Has Bluetooth connectivity for listening to tunes from your phone! Comes with a universal remote which looks like you can program to many devices including cable boxes!
282.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

283.author: MyBB13j
283.review: The sound bar is small and compact but the sound is better than my t.v speakers. I can definitely hear my movies much better especially late at night when all is quiet. I had to get used to the sound at first because i would think it is 360 sound but it the sound comes straight forward towards you when sitting in front of it. Overall it is okay. My room is small i didn't want anything big.
283.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

284.author: ATXNATHAN
284.review: This sound bar packs a punch! Don't be fooled by its small size! This sound bar replaced a full 7 speaker setup and sounds way better than all of those speakers put together. This is perfect for an apartment since it doesnt come with a subwoofer but still has outstanding bass and very high quality as BOSE is known for. Love this product!
284.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

285.author: mary
285.review: we bought a Bose sound bar for our mother so she could hear the television dialogue more easily. it was a simple set up with no need for a subwoofer, which was a plus in our situation. it doesn’t provide a lot of extra bass that some want for movie viewing, but that wasn’t why we were purchasing. it does sound very nice for movies, even so....
285.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

286.author: yadavexcell
286.review: I got it on a sale and so bought it even when i saw several reviewers stating its not an impressive sound bar and there are several alternatives to it. however I needed it for a small room and Bose name cant go wrong. Sound quality wasnt a big decisive favtir for me for a small room. its not impressive but its not bad either. Get it if you see it on a sale.
286.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

287.author: jacob
287.review: Me and my wife are very satisfied with this soundbar. The current state of Television development has rendered sound performance insufficient, and Bose has typically been the remedy for that. The Solo 5 is a great option for large rooms where filling sounds can drown out the voices in movies. We love it, and would highly recommend this product.
287.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

288.author: Ravi
288.review: I live in a condo. The TV is on the wall and the dialog was hard to understand; I was always reading the closed captions. The Bose sound bar has a voice feature that makes all the dialog easy to hear. Also, I did not want a separate woofer; I thought it would distrub my neighbors. The quality of the music is excellend without it.
288.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

289.author: Fitchburger
289.review: The smallest sound bar with the biggest bang for your buck. Easy to install, takes up little space. Bose is the leader in sound technology with another winner in this category. If you have a state of the art television and are not impressed with the sound(like most TVs), this sound bar makes a world of difference. It is not so big but and produces an unbelievable level of sound,
289.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

290.author: Bartjim
290.review: There was a little difficulty syncing it with my Harmony remote and getting the "universal" remote control to control all my devices. On the other hand, it improved the sound coming from my television -- albeit not as much as my traditional surroundsound system attached to my primary TV. In short, it does the job its supposed to do; and nothing more.
290.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

291.author: Doc3357
291.review: I have purchased Bose equipment before and when I was at Best Buy getting my new TV I knew I was going to buy a sound bar, too. When Magnolia agent "Ben" showed me the Bose I knew I didn't have to look no further! Great sound and quality. Perfect smaller size for where it was needed. Don't forget to ask about the mounting brackets... makes it more convenient!
291.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

292.author: Cobb
292.review: We love our new Bose sound bar. It was easy to set up and makes a huge difference in our TV viewing experience. Dialog is very easy to understand and we still get great clarity and detail for listening to music. The universal remote is also a big upgrade for our home, though my wife hasn’t quite gotten the hang of it.
292.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

293.author: go4it
293.review: Needed a small sound bar to improve the TV sound. This little bar is perfect for a smaller stand or wall space. Bose has always provided a great sound for a reasonable cost. This doesn't need a separate woofer and it comes with a universal remote that will turn on the cable box, TV and sound bar together and can scroll through the channels with ease. Great product.
293.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

294.author: Snhildreth
294.review_title: Basically awesome with a minor inconvenience
294.review: Love the sound bar. Easy to install and definitely helps with the uneven distribution of sound with TVs these days. My only complaint is when adjusting the volume you can't see it on your TV so you have no idea where you are. So it can be difficult to get it right for the room. But other than that it's awesome
294.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

295.author: JMT4
295.review: This Bose sound bar has amazing clear sound. That's mainly what you get since there's no subwoofer. I knew what I was getting into when I purchased it. Installation was easy and took less than 2 minutes after it was opened. Unfortunately I was disappointed because I wanted a little more bass. I ended up exchanging this for the JBL SB250. What a difference!!!
295.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

296.author: Dexter
296.review: I purchased this to go with my new TV for my office and it works great. The room is 12x12 so the sound doesn't have to shake the walls but the Bose clarity is very evident and the room is just different when there is Bose sound in it... I researched this item , went to the store and made the purchase and is exactly what I expected and wanted... Highly recommended
296.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

297.author: JMGrace
297.review: I bought this for my mother who is hard of hearing. She Loves it!! I don't know why I never thought of getting a sound bar sooner for her and our home. The sound is so clear and there's no need for subtitles anymore. Easy to install, but wish the remote was a little smaller. Overall, we are all in favor of Bose when we watch movies and TV from now on.
297.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

298.author: yllw98stng
298.review: If you want any bass at all, this is not the sound bar for you. I read plenty of online reviews for this sound bar before I bought it and while it generally gets very high reviews, I was absolutely unimpressed with the sound quality. Granted, it doesn't come with a subwoofer, so maybe I was expecting too much before my purchase. It is, however, extremely easy to hook up.
298.recommend: No, I would not recommend this to a friend

299.author: Bear
299.review: The bass is a bit lacking, but without a separate bass speaker that's to be expected. Otherwise, the sound is terrific - and a whole lot better than the tiny speakers that are in the TV we purchased. This is our 3rd flat screen TV and sound bar, and two of our sound bars are Bose. The other is a Samsung to match the 40" TV we have. All sound and work well.
299.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

300.author: Dan292
300.review: We wanted a little louder, a little crisper sound to go with our new 65-inch curved TV, so we bought this. We thought the price was right, we like the brand, and the sound is much better than what the TV will do on its own, especially the base sounds. Adding one of these sound bars will further enhance the theater-like experience of watching one of these curved TVs. Recommended.
300.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

301.author: PatrickP
301.review: For being a small unit with no separate sub woofer, the sound quality fills my living room. The blue tooth connectivity is great. The universal remote is extremely convenient. Only reason I didn’t give it five stars is because at high volume the bass doesn’t keep up. If it had the ability to add a sub it would be a five star rating for sure.
301.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

302.author: jflored
302.review_title: Great sound! For a small room
302.review: $250 price tag , its a pretty decent price once you take it home and hear how crisp the sound is. My only complaint is you cant add any other speakers or bass. Which is the only reason i returned it and bought the 300 soundtouch soundbar. If your looking for a soundbar for a small room or dont care about bass or surround sound speakers, this little soundbar is perfect.
302.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

303.author: Rondon
303.review_title: Satisfactory product; however, not what expected.
303.review:
This Sony Soundbar does not provide the loud/rich sound that I expected. I am not talking blow out the windows loud. Some Soundbars reach levels that are too loud, but not this one. Further, there is no sound indicator on the unit which would have been nice in order to set the volume at a certain level (higher or lower).
I anticipated better quality from a Bose system.
303.recommend: No, I would not recommend this to a friend

304.author: ProGun
304.review: First let me start by saying I was hesitate to buy this soundbar but at time of purchase I was returning another one that would not work with my TV the negative reviews made me doubt this one but did remember the overwhelming positive ones long story short I,m very happy with this purchase and would do it again if need be. Sound quality is excellent bass is ok but works for me.
304.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

305.author: Julieona1a
305.review: This sound bar is simply terrific. The sound exceeded my expectations. I own other Bose products and have not ever been disappointed, always very pleased. It was so easy to install and the remote was easy to program. This universal remote does the job of three remotes, what a convenience! If I can install the sound bar and program the remote, anyone can.
305.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

306.author: Adriawt
306.review:
Excellent soundbar for small spaces. Overall it is an excellent value for the price. At the price point it really cant be beat by any of the other comparably priced models out there, especially if you are looking to save on space.

The reason for the 4 star rating: This bose model lacks a bit of the sound quality of its higher end siblings and the remote is clunky and feels cheap.
306.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

307.author: MiAmigo18
307.review_title: Bose sound bar unsatisfactory for many reasons.
307.review: Made very little different in sound quality, and the universal remote--froze pictures on cable stations if you went to HD. The remote not as flexible as the cable remote--so you still to use both I need clarity in the spoken word--the Bose did not deliver--I really wanted it to work--disappointed--still searching.
307.recommend: No, I would not recommend this to a friend

308.author: Kris
308.review: While dropping $270 some odd dollars may seem like a lot, considering what your getting its not at all. The sound is great, and hooking it up via bluetooth is a breeze. the only downside is you don't know what the number volume its set on so make sure if your watching it in the morning to turn it down before turning it off, you may find it blasting when you turn it on at night!
308.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

309.author: Mike89
309.review: Great sound for a smaller room got this for my bedroom tv to get a richer sound for movies and gameing. The remote that it comes with controls my tv as well so it's fine that it doesn't have hdmi arc. Would be a 5 star but there are no buttons on the sound bar so you have to use the remote to change itputs and sound.
309.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

310.author: anna
310.review: We just purchased a sony 75' TV and needed something better for the sound. We purchased this speaker and a different bose model that had a subwoofer. This was so great, it sounded better than without and it was SUPER easy to set up. However, we thought the one with the subwoofer sounded a little bit better. They are both bose though so you cannot really go wrong.
310.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

311.author: Chuck
311.review: Already have a 7.1 system in the family room and needed something in my den. Great for low to moderate sound levels and the voice enhancement feature is outstanding. Remote was super easy to set up for TV, Cable Box, etc. You won't need any other remote! Getting one for my Dad who has trouble hearing dialogue.
311.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

312.author: Shopper
312.review: I purchased this Bose sound bar to go with a new television in the kitchen. Set-up was very easy, the size is perfect and the sound is great. I could not get the remote (a Bose. Universal remote) to work with our Directv box. That is the reason for 4 stars. But our phones sync perfectly and do every time. I would purchase it again.
312.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

313.author: ROboT
313.review: Great speaker.It doesn’t sync with my cable box but at least it does to my tv.Bass is good and not excessive like a subwoofer so if you want some bass but not tons this speaker is for you.Bought it and then a few days later it went on sale for less ☹️ Wish I would have waited I could have saved money.
313.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

314.author: Badpawpa
314.review: I'm in my 60's, and the speakers in my new thin tv are very substandard. I was having trouble hearing clear dialog, so that's why I chose this speaker. I sat it in front of my Samsung tv, plug in the optic sound cable, turned off the tv speaker, and plug it in. That's all I did, and now I can hear what they are saying on tv again.
314.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

315.author: iMik3
315.review: I have use a full separate speaker surround system 5.1, by Bose, and I must say the Bose Solo 5 Soundbar is very impressive. For such a small speaker, I get an amazing surround feeling and the bass level is kinda freaking me out because I can't figure out just how they are getting so much bass out of such a small package! Love it!
315.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

316.author: Dimplszzz
316.review_title: My neighbor recommended it; she has one
316.review: Improves the sound quality in my living room significantly. Because the new flatscreens have their speakers somewhere other than the front, and my house has a built-in, the sound was just kind of 'stuck' in the TV alcove. With the little soundbar in front of the TV, now the audio projects into the room and is easier to hear and more clear than what was coming from the TV.
316.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

317.author: Acman
317.review_title: Doesn’t live up to the Bose name
317.review: Disappointed. Performance matches low cost. Sound level at high is low and the base is so so. Had to return the speaker because it wouldn’t turn on/off properly causing it to get out of sink with the tv on/off cycle. It boils down to you get what you pay for. Pay the higher price for a better sound bar. You will be much happier.
317.recommend: No, I would not recommend this to a friend

318.author: Venkat
318.review:
its been more than a month, using bose sound bar, i was looking for a sound bar small and effective, 

Pros
it has good base required,option to hear the audio/dialogue clearly, definitely happy with the purchase.
Cons: no controls on the sound bar, i.e you need remote for everything.
either bluethooth or tv can be connected at a time not both.but thats ok.
318.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

319.author: Happy
319.review: ....not happy that the soundbar controller isn’t integrated with the TV Controller. You need to turn on the soundbar with one controller and the tv with the other controller. Anoying! Would be much more efficient if one controller managed both the TV and the soundbar. Too many controllers!
319.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

320.author: Eagan
320.review: I first bought a Samsung sound bar, but the wife thought it was too loud. So I bought her this, she saw the Bose name on it, that it was smaller, and that it was quieter, and she loves it. Best of all, I get the Samsung for my room where it's capabilities can be enjoyed. Happy Wife, Happy Life, and Life is Goot
320.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

321.author: Fireproof
321.review: We really like this sound bar it has really nice crisp clear clean sound love that it doesn't have a subwoofer with it that was one things we were looking to not have when we were looking at sound bars this bar has good base on its own which is something that Bose does really well I'd buy this sound bar again if I needed another one for anything
321.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

322.author: Antivirus
322.review: I wanted something that wasn’t overly big. I also wanted something with very good sound and after staying in the Best Buy store for over an hour and listening to the difference between Sonos and Bose I finally made a decision and bought the solo and I’m very glad I did. great sound!!
322.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

323.author: Bronx10468
323.review_title: Amazing Soundbar for a Great Price
323.review: Over the last year, I have been in the market for a soundbar. When I found out that Bose created a inexpensive soundbar, i jumped right on the bandwagon and was surprised by the quality of the sound and the make. It sounds amazing with or without bass. I dont know how I watched television before having this soundbar. A+++ everything.
323.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

324.author: Brad
324.review: I bought this Bose 5 solo for better sound for my 32' samsung tv, bedroom, and the sound/quality is great. I recommend this product. P.S. the sound quality of this Bose 5 system at the store and in one's home is 'light and night' - at the store the sound was ok, but in my room I definitely here the quality. I hope my opinion was helpful :)
324.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

325.author: Hudde
325.review: I bought this Bose sound bar due to reviews that said they were able to hear voices better; it is an improvement but not by much. Now as to sound (especially with movies) it is a drastic improvement over my TV speakers. It is somewhat surprising coming from such a small bar with no woofer.
325.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

326.author: Scarlett
326.review: Does anyone know if Bose has corrected the issues that are listed on these reviews? This would be perfect for my small den, but needs to be simple for me. I purchased a Bose stereo a couple of years ago, and the sound is not nearly as good as a very old one a friend has.....sad that quality seems to go down rather than up these days.
326.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

327.author: MAFZ
327.review: I know BOSE is an excellent brand talking about sound, to be hones I was hesitating in getting this one since it is a small size speaker, I think for an apartment is a great speaker, not too sure for a bigger living room, but if you live in an apartment this is great, finally I can hear what they're saying in the movies, totally worth it
327.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

328.author: GWillieL
328.review: All I was looking for was a nice upgrade to the TV sound in a small room. What I got was a stereo upgrade playing TV and music giving the room an entire entertainment center just by adding a speaker. I’ve always been impressed with Bose products and this one is no disappointment. Great sound for a great price.
328.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

329.author: MScott
329.review: The soundbar produces great sound for not having a wireless sub. It doesn't sound hollow when watching tv or movies and music sound great. Bluetooth pairing is so easy and a great feature. The bar is very sleek and looks beautiful under the tv. If you have a large space you may want to consider the higher modes but for a smaller living room this works beautifully.
329.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

330.author: Gautam
330.review: I have kept this in my small bedroom which has walls on the sides of this speaker. I was really amazed at the bass and effects this small piece could generate. However, just for testing I kept this in my large hall and found it to produce average sound compared to solo 15 series 2. So if u are looking for a sound system in bed room, then definitely go for this.
330.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

331.author: RoyJ
331.review: This unit DID NOT make my TV sound $250 better. It barely made a difference. The universal remote was only partially compatible with my TV, therefore adding one more remote to the stack. The "voice" setting didn't make dialog any more clear, which is why I purchased it. Took it back!
331.recommend: No, I would not recommend this to a friend

332.author: Rex1277
332.review:
The remote is worth the price you pay for the entire unit Sound is great if your looking to have stereo sound with Bose bass. Much better than tv sound and adiqut for movies Remote is easy to program for various devices. Simple to operate. Sound from unit has Bose richness 
Great price for unit, great unit for someone not looking for 5.1 or exsteam volume.
332.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

333.author: Jennifer
333.review: This sound bar was worth every penny! It makes you feel as though you’re in the movie listening to it happen. I’ve actually heard Weslyan are different things that I thought were happening in my home that were coming from the TV because of the clear sound . I would definitely recommend this to anyone looking for a sound bar
333.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

334.author: Shirls
334.review_title: Good sound bar for the price
334.review: The sound bar was super easy to hook up. The sound is great and we can hear our TV programs much better with the button for conversations selected as other reviews have mentioned. I do agree with other reviews that it would be nice if this feature was on automatically and could be turned off if ever desired.
334.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

335.author: bubba
335.review: hard of hearing thought this would help but not impressed have to use their remote to tun it on then it turns itself off integrating the remote itself is difficult for this geezer and you loose the lighted buttons not what i thought it should be
335.recommend: No, I would not recommend this to a friend

336.author: JDGUILTY
336.review_title: Big things come in small packages
336.review: I use this soundbar in my den to accompany my Visio 32" TV. It's tough to beat in terms of the sound you get for the price. I am, however, very partial to Bose products. The only thing that would be nice is if it had an HDMI connection. I'm using the optical connection to go between the soundbar and the TV.
336.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

337.author: Rafa
337.review_title: Great sound bar for small to medium rooms
337.review: It is loud and sounds great for small and medium rooms, can fill a whole room. If you’re looking for something for a living room or a big area probably the bigger one is a better option, this one will do the job but probably won’t be as loud as you’d want to for that big of a space. For bedrooms it is perfect
337.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

338.author: MichaelC
338.review: The "brochure" is nothing more than a few dozens words instructing how to install the phone. My wife took the Zeiss VR 1 back to Best Buy and talked to the Geek Squad to figure out how it worked. Basically, there was not much to look see at all on the device. She doesn't want it and it was the only thing she asked for, for Christmas. Big disappointment.
338.recommend: No, I would not recommend this to a friend

339.author: CallsignWT
339.review_title: A perfect compliment to a mid size TV
339.review: Simple to control and adjust, completely unobtrusive while delivering quality sound. It isn't a substitute for a home theater system by any means. It does however provide the best sound experience for a small to medium sized room without having to worry abut upsetting the neighbors.
339.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

340.author: Bover
340.review: I needed a compact sound bar. It was this or the Sony. I felt the sound quality and features of the Sony were better than the Bose. The separate sub and ability to pay music via the usb pushed me to keep the Sony. If the Bose had an hdmi connection it may have tipped the scales.
340.recommend: No, I would not recommend this to a friend

341.author: navyvetfes87
341.review_title: Best sound ever from my TV and computer
341.review: I've always liked Bose and this was actually my first Bose purchase. I shouldn't have waited. I can hear audio on my TV that you just can't hear with the regular built in TV speakers. Best investment anyone can make. The built in Bluetooth on the speaker lets me play all my music from my computer also, huge bonus.
341.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

342.author: Rizz
342.review: We had purchased a new 55" Samsung TV and wanted to incorporate a sound bar with it. We had limited space for a sound bar so size was a major consideration. We felt that the Bose item was worth a try. It has totally met our expectations. Easy to set up and the sound is very good for the size of the bar.
342.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

343.author: Star3232
343.review: Absolutely love the Bose Solo 5. Easy hook up. The sound is amazing when watching a movie. I love that it has blue tooth capabilities. I can use my iPhone to play my songs or Pandora Radio super easy. Great price too. The unit is small so it does not take up a lot of space. You can't go wrong with this system. Great purchase!
343.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

344.author: TheSmartDude
344.review: Love Bose products and this speaker lives up to Bose’s Reputation and my expectations. In use for the kids room tv. Perfectly simple speaker that provides beautiful quality sound with enough volume to watch a Disney movie enjoyably but also doesn’t allow the kids to blast music so loud that it disturbes the neighbors.
344.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

345.author: Dany
345.review: Excellent for tv sound in apartments condition this is a good little speaker. It works well, has solid bluetooth input from your phone and other devices. While it has a good amount of bass for a sound bar (and a small bar at that), it's not a subwoofer and feels just a bit flat compared to one. It's a nice small footprint.
345.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

346.author: Kamahama3x
346.review: I purchased this for my parents who complained that they couldn't hear the dialogue on their shows. This was super easy to hook up and we had it all set up in about ten minutes. The sound difference was amazing and for the price point you can't beat it. Love that it is bluetooth enabled and you can stream your music as wel
346.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

347.author: GamerWeasel
347.review: The sound bar was not difficult to install. It gives a good sound quality. The dialog mode does help. However, even when I turn the volume up, it's not loud enough for my elderly father. If you need a sound system loud enough to rattle the windows, this isn't it.
347.recommend: No, I would not recommend this to a friend

348.author: Adam
348.review: The internal speakers on my LG 4K tv produce really low volume for dialogue compared to the other noise volumes. This sound bar did a great job evening out this problem. Now I can watch movies without having to constantly adjust the volume levels. Very happy with this purchase!
348.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

349.author: JB50266
349.review:
If you want a good simple sound bar, this is the one. We purchased this for our living room and set it on our mantle. It does have good surround for the room.

The sound is really good. The reason for the four stars vs five is because it won't update via thumb drive. I have called Bose and was supposed to receive a thumb drive and it never arrived.
349.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

350.author: Samq
350.review: I always prefer Bose products and purchased this item based on past experience with Bose. I used an optical input direct from the TV which is used in a noisy exercise room that I use for cycle training. The bar does provide louder sound than just the TV audio so it was worth the expense to overcome my noisy environment.
350.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

351.author: Andrew
351.review: This is a good sound bar for those who don't want to go all in on a big 5.1 system. The sound is clear and understandable and it has a very fine volume control so you can find the perfect volume. With our old Vizio sound bar it was always one click away from being to quiet or too loud.
351.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

352.author: Jamie
352.review: I took it back. In the store it sounded AMAZING, but when I got it home in an open space it wasn't any better than the old cheap soundbar we already had. If this is for a new setup it's probably pretty good, but, despite being a Bose, it's not much of an upgrade from an otherwise decent soundbar.
352.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

353.author: Poppy98
353.review: Once again Bose came through for me. I needed an inexpensive soundbar for my 5th wheel TV, and this fit the bill perfectly. The trademark full sound is great for our limited size. The only thing I would wish for is an app that would let me adjust the bass end.
353.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

354.author: NOLAgirl
354.review: A big improvement over my previous soundbar. Voices are clearer although not as crisp and distinguishable as I thought they would be. But it is still an improvement for people who are hard of hearing. The size is a bit smaller in length and height than others I have seen and/or owned and that is a plus. It doesn't take focus away from the tv.
354.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

355.author: Boba
355.review_title: Good Sound for a smaller room
355.review: This sound bar is very good for a smaller room. The dialog setting is very effective in cleaning up mushy sound so that even hard of hearing people can understand what is being said. It removes some of the high and low ranges and enhances the mid ranges so the spoken word is easier to hear. The default setting is fine for most music audio
355.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

356.author: Mike
356.review_title: Found it easy to set up
356.review: Despite some reviews that I had read prior to purchase, I found the Bose sound bar easy to set up. The remote control that was included was easily tuned to my TV and cable box. I had no problems getting it ready to go. The sound quality is excellent.
356.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

357.author: redhaunch
357.review: The sound quality is typical Bose, which is fantastic. My only issue if you can even call it that, is that the plug in cable coming from the TV to the soundbar sometimes comes unpluged when my wife dusts the shelf. Just a slight nuisance since we don't catch it until we turn the TV on, mute the TV sound and then discover we have no sound.
357.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

358.author: Jules
358.review: I really love this solo for my Sony smart 60inch tv. But most of all my son loves it to play his music and games. It would have been helpful if I didn’t have to used 3 remotes. But I can live with it since the sound trumps the 3 remotes
358.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

359.author: coldwaterite
359.review: We bought this sound bar because of it's length and that it was a Bose. The Samsung sound bar was too long for our TV stand, this Bose was a great fit. Sound quality is excellent. The sound from our new TV kept fluctuating and we'd have to continually raise / lower the volume to hear conversations. Now the sound is consistent.
359.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

360.author: MikeyT
360.review: I got this for my Dad for Christmas. Now that he’s had it for a couple months, he liked it, but he said it’s nowhere near the sound from standalone surround sound speakers. I’d say if you have a small room, go for it, but if you want booming sound, don’t settle for a sound bar. You’ll be disappointed...
360.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

361.author: Bert
361.review: Smaller than most sound bars out there but has enormous Bose sound. Looks awesome with my new LG OLED 55 inch curved television. I Love that it came with a full universal remote. It also has the capability to bluetooth with up to 8 devices. I found a cheaper price on Amazon and Best Buy didnt hesitate to give me the lower price,
361.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

362.author: DaveB
362.review: I connected my new Solo 5 to a smaller-sized LED TV that had awful sound. What a BIG difference! And, the price was excellent. The size and absence of multiple speakers has no compromised sound quality. I should have bought 2 of them.
362.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

363.author: BBuyer
363.review: Listened to this and other bars in BB and thought it would serve my needs in the living room perfectly. It is not 5.1 and no subwoofer. Purpose of this bar is basically to give you a more powerful sound than your tv can provide at a reasonable price and Bose quality. Also voice isolation is a nice feature as is Bluetooth connectivity option.
363.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

364.author: Bleecker
364.review: I was considering the Sonos playbar at triple the price until I stumbled on reviews that ranked this Bose pretty high. Voice enhancement very useful and enough base for me. Very good sound in compact unit. If space is a concern, as it was for me, even more reason to check this one out.
364.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

365.author: Bbishop50
365.review_title: i have always loved the Bose products
365.review: Through many a year i have purchase different audio speakers and products. It seems like i eventually always gravitate back to Bose. Everthibg from radio to cd players. Purchases i have made of Bose product 20 years ago still perform with the highest qiality. I will continue to buy Bose products but would wish there were largrr selections at Best Buy.
365.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

366.author: Drew
366.review: We’ve got this wall mounted beneath the TV (purchased separately) and the sound quality is incredible. The mount leans a little forward, but it’s not too much to complain about. The sound bar itself is just unparalleled with any audio equipment I’ve ever used. Highly recommended.
366.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

367.author: Knight
367.review:
I need a sound system for my 32 inch Samsung hd tv and my Sony 
DVD/blue ray player.
When I watch my blue ray movies the audio/talking seems was faint.
But the bose solo 5 sound bar made everything much better.
Thanks you Bose.
367.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

368.author: Bill
368.review: We added the Bose Solo 5 to our 2009 LG 37" LCD in the den and the audio improvement over the TV speakers is amazing. Installation and setup was simple and we are completely satisfied with the purchase. Like our Bose WaveCD radio, this will become one of the two most used pieces of audio equipment at home.
368.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

369.author: jawnstuff
369.review:
We replaced another soundbar with this Bose model and couldn't be happier. The dialog mode is perfect for watching shows when you almost need to strain to hear what the actors are saying.
I've used Bose speakers in my media room for years and also use Bose for my DJ gigs.
369.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

370.author: DKap
370.review: This is our 2nd Bose Soundbar. We bought SoundTouch 300 for the living room and are loving it! Solo is a big sound in a smaller package. It comes with the universal remote so we paired it with our Smart LG TV and are operating both the TV and Bose Solo with the Bose universal remote.
370.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

371.author: jerrymorris
371.review: We purchase this smaller soundbar for a sound system we install into smaller churches. It reproduces the piano music we've had recorded in perfect clarity and in top quality. For the small church that does not have a piano player, this is the component we depend on for the best sound delivery.
371.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

372.author: Smitty
372.review: I wanted something simple and compact that would supply quality sound particularly when it comes to hearing voices. I don't want big base or surround sound...I want to understand what people are saying. This product fits my requirements perfectly at a reasonable price. Bose consistently provides quality products both in my home and autos.
372.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

373.author: Shop4us
373.review: This thing has the best sound quality. Sad I waited so long to get another one when our Polkaudio one was getting bad! Love that the remote is not just for sound bar and is a big remote to program TV/dvd everything so only need 1 remote
373.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

374.author: pwb3
374.review: I bought the Bose Solo 5 TV Soundbar to improve the sound coming from the tv. I bought the solo because I don't need a more complete sound system for the small space that I'm using this speaker. The sound is very good as to be expected from Bose. The one think I don't like is there is no visual way of knowing at what level I'm at.
374.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

375.author: Roadrunner
375.review: Was looking for a high quality Sound Bar for my 50" Plasma that I moved into my Bedroom (New 65" OLED in Living Room) WITHOUT a seperate Base Component!!! At $250 a little bit pricey for the size…but you get what you pay for…and I wasn't disappointed!!!
375.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

376.author: Andy
376.review: There great tell about year 3 when it starts to not turn on, you unplug and it comes back then one day that does not work anymore, now just will not turn on. and after the warranty runs out. did research its a common thing, so buyer beware.
376.recommend: No, I would not recommend this to a friend

377.author: jwells
377.review: The connection is seamless. Be sure you have a place for it. If in front of your tv, make sure it won’t block your screen. Check your stand height for this. The quality is great, but it doesn’t seem to get too loud. It’s perfect for a smaller living room or bedroom. The remote is pretty cool too.
377.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

378.author: Hearingitall
378.review: Two members of my family has problems understanding the dialogue on the local news and various tv shows. No more. This sound bar brings the dialogue to the forefront, easy to hear everything now. The sales rep recommended this unit and we are glad he did.
378.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

379.author: Jackson
379.review_title: Good general purpose supplemental speaker for TV.
379.review: I spent some time listening to supplemental speakers for my 55 inch TV. This sound is an upgrade without too high of a price. I like that they can be adjusted for voice clarity. The blue tooth feature is a plus, as you can listen to music from another source without the wires. I almost like using them for this purpose better than the TV.
379.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

380.author: BS23XY
380.review: I couldn’t really tell a difference between my TV sound vs. this sound bar. It’s got volume, but I was really looking for an impact on sound quality. It wasnt bad though. I have a good TV. I ended up returning the sound bar. I’ll need the large Bose setup to really make a difference in sound quality.
380.recommend: No, I would not recommend this to a friend

381.author: Steve
381.review: I love the great sound with compact size. I connected it to midgrade Samsung TV and could not get the TV controller to work with sound bar or Bose remote to control TV. It was connected via optical cable. So for now we are stuck using 2 remotes.
381.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

382.author: Enolive
382.review: This is the perfect solution. Our Flat screen speaker placement made it difficult to hear the TV and enjoy movies. I was expecting a small boost but the Bose soundbar is great. We get the full ambience and experience of sports, movies, and television. I will be looking to buy one of these for each tv we have.
382.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

383.author: Jazze
383.review: It is a good sound enhancer. It works well for me as I use it in my bedroom on a 55 inch tv. I don't need too much bass and I am quite happy with my Bose system. If the remote were a little smaller I would give it 5 stars. If you are looking for movie theater sound and bass this is not the system you want.
383.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

384.author: Day9
384.review: It's a good soundbar. It was fairly easy to connect via wireless to our Echo Dot to connect our Spotify and hear it well through the house. The downfall is the only visual is a blinking dot on the sound bar if you raise or lower the volume. We wished that it would showcase on the tv or even on the soundbar the volume in numbers.
384.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

385.author: 2jacksdig
385.review: My previous sound bar quick working and I wanted to find an affordable replacement that was not too big for a small room. The Bose unit has big sound for a small unit. I get plenty of base but dont need to clutter up the room with a separate subwoofer. So glad I picked this unit. I may get another one for a larger room too.
385.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

386.author: Will
386.review: I already have a Bose surround system so I thought that I might as well buy a respective product to match what I have. It did not disappoint, it has incredible sound and the Bluetooth option is perfect for when all you want to do is listen to music. I highly recommend this product to anyone and the price was right with in my budget
386.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

387.author: Johnny
387.review: Very disappointed in this sound bar. We bought this unit to use in our motorhome. The tv in the motorhome is not loud enough when the air-conditioning is running so we bought this sound bar. We chose this model because of past experience with Bose and its compact size. But it is no louder than the tv. Very disappointed.
387.recommend: No, I would not recommend this to a friend

388.author: bd1212
388.review: Mrg took care of my issues. The sound bar went into a rental condo of mine on the beach. I was having issues with the system and could not be there to take care of it. His team went to my condo and resolved the issues and did not charge me a trip charge. That was going the extra mile.
388.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

389.author: MJjr
389.review: If you're limited on space, or just don't want to use a floor bass module, this is the one you want. it won't provide the pounding bass a floor module provides, but this the best center speaker you'll find. it does a very good job for what it is, and it is much better than other center speakers. I know, I tried a couple.
389.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

390.author: Pati
390.review: Product is great but store rep did not know product. Wanted a sound bar to connect to my blue tooth head phones so i wouldn't hear my hubby chewing popcorn. Turns out this bar will play my ipod via blue tooth thru the bar but won't play the tv via blue tooth to the head phones. Great product but doesn't doe what i wanted
390.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

391.author: Yasss
391.review: This is perfect for a small apartment for watching movies or playing music and you don't want to make your neighbors mad. Sound is really clear. Perfect for my 65 inch Samsung. If you have your own house I would recommend getting something more powerful unless you plan on putting it in bedroom. Thanks Bose for making quality products.
391.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend
