392.author: TBdad
392.review: I wanted a sound bar to fit a very specific space. This was the only one that met my criteria. Although I like the feature that sharpens voices when watching shows that have mainly talking & little sound, I found this product average (especially for Bose). I wanted to get one with a separate sub, but those would not fit the space I have.
392.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

393.author: meljo
393.review: Bose has a great reputation which is why we bought this sound bar. We recently moved and our living room is not optimal for surround sound, so we replaced it the Bose Soto 5. Great sound quality. I was really impressed with you could actually hear the back ground noise from it. I would recommend this to anyone.
393.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

394.author: ml832
394.review_title: small, nice alternative to flat panel speakers
394.review: Very easy setup. Nice and compact. Good sound. I'm very happy with the ability of the remote to support all the devices with ease so you only need to use the one and not several different remotes. A couple of friends have already purchased this product based on my recommendation and are very happy with it for similar reasons.
394.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

395.author: BestBuyMan88
395.review: BOSE will amaze you with the sound that they jammed into this soundbar. I still do not understand how they were able to get the bass response out of this soundbar, but it sounds great! It is not like having a multiple piece system, but it will more than do the job in smaller spaces where you want less cords and less mess.
395.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

396.author: Riyaz
396.review_title: Great sound from a small box
396.review: I bought this because the speakers on my TV were not loud enough for the living room. This soundbar was super easy to setup and we enjoying great sound in about 5 mins! For a little device you get great sound and now we can really hear the dialogue well. Makes watching TV and movies a lot more fun now!
396.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

397.author: Bearfan
397.review: I purchased this bar to improve the audio on my Samsung plasma. I was surprised by the sound quality from this small sound bar but that is what Bose is all about. If you want a huge improvement in audio on a budget this is the one you want to buy. No HDMI, only optical, but plenty of sound for its purpose,
397.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

398.author: rsava
398.review: without much space for bulky equipment we needed a sound bar that would significantly upgrade the sound coming out of the TV speakers and boy does this sound bar do it. even without the floor sub woofer this device does the job. excellent crisp sound. easy installation but you have to buy the bose bracket (~30$), very satisfied!
398.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

399.author: threeohfive
399.review: I love this soundbar, the only complaint I have about it is that it doesn't have that much bass. But other than that it's good. And for some reason it when I try to turn it on, it doesn't turn on sometimes and it just turns on the tv instead since I have it set up with the universal control that it comes with.
399.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

400.author: Dan1234
400.review: I priced larger sound bars, and bang for the buck, this is a good bar. Its loud enough to hear talk shows and sports event, and clear enough to watch a movie. It doesn't have the sound spectrum that the larger bars have, but for the price its a really good option.
400.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

401.author: gk65807
401.review: Easy to setup. Not the quality I would expect from Bose, a cheaper sound bar would give near the same results for far less money. I like Bose speakers, but they are not good at making a cheaper version. I returned it and bought something cheaper that I also returned. Must re-think price point and decide what to spend.
401.recommend: No, I would not recommend this to a friend

402.author: Hurly
402.review: We bought this because the speakers in the TV just don't do the trick. When watching a lot of movies, the action is really loud but you can't hear people talking. This really helps, but It's not really that impressive with out the sub woofer (not included) So I think another 3 or $400 from now we will have a decent system.
402.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

403.author: Billybob
403.review:
Great sound with no bulky subwoofer needed! Easy connection and easy on and off. SIMPLE especially when used with HDMI control . It powers on and off with TV automatically!
Love the full sound and loud volume. Dialogue button helps in late night viewing.
403.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

404.author: msemcee43
404.review_title: Really nice sound out of a smallish bar
404.review: Really nice sound out of a smallish bar. Crisp and clear. I live in a condo that is a converted apartment from the 1960's. Is perfect for my living room and do not worry about sharing my tv sound with my neighbors. I am delighted with this sound bar. It is perfect for my needs with superb sound from both voice and music.
404.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

405.author: Rahul
405.review:
Pros: The soundbar is light weight and handy and portable. Setup is easy. By connecting couple of cords, you are good to go. 
Cons: Sound output is not good enough for large rooms. Works best if the soundbar is kept on an elevated platform. The remote is extremely bulky.
Good for a small room .
405.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

406.author: New2Canuto
406.review: I read a couple of reviews that rated this a bit low. My daughter bought it for me as a surprise. I was surprised but to listen to how good and clear everything sounded. I'm amazed with the new sound from my tv and would recommend this to anyone.
406.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

407.author: Bolo
407.review: TV speaker was ok and I needed better sound then the TV speaker alone. I checked all the soundbars they all sounds good, but I wanted compact with good sound quality and I found that Bose soundbar was compact with very good sound quality. I really like this soundbar for small place.
407.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

408.author: Mike
408.review: Best compact sound bar value on the market. Bought one for our lake home and am so impressed we will buy one for our home when we return. Great feature is the dialogue setting when listening to news that allows voices to be clearly heard, plus the overall fidelity and exceptional bass output for such a small sound bar! Love it!
408.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

409.author: Marc4427
409.review: I heard the Sonus at the store and was blown away but didn't want to spend 699 since I won't be using my family room as much as my living room . The Bose Solo 5 does its job and I'm glad I can play my music via Bluetooth through my phone to my solo 5. It's also much better than the tv speakers .
409.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

410.author: AlanJ1982
410.review_title: Good sound and price...don't like the remote
410.review: Good added base in a small size at a reasonable price. My only complaint is about the remote.......it will not accept the device code specified in the Bose book for my Samsung TV. So I have two remotes to control the volumes.....one for the TV, the other for the Bose unit. Not ideal. I still like the product.
410.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

411.author: VIPHal
411.review: Bought for my new TV but, didn't realize the window for the remote was dead center at bottom of TV BUMMER!!! now I have to wall mount it or put on shelf under TV.Thought to myself ? Who would make a speaker to set in front of TV and then put remote window on TV right in the center. in all good sound ,just can't center it to TV
411.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

412.author: BD1953
412.review: I bought this speaker for my flat screen television as I was having trouble understanding what was being said. I no longer have that problem. I have another flat screen, which I thought had good sound, but now I will probably get one for that tv also.
412.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

413.author: Steve
413.review: The BOSE Soundbar delivers typical BOSE pristine audio quality. I would give it 5 stars EXCEPT there is an annoying issue I have not been able to resolve. The unit often (like every other time I turn it on) freezes when I turn it on, forcing me to unplug it and plug it in again. Then, it works fine.
413.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

414.author: Edspeaksbose
414.review_title: Great speaker to enhance tv speakers
414.review: Good speaker which adds clarity and extra base when watching movies. The speaker don't get that load but is not needed for smaller rooms but does add a lot of sound when watching movies that standard tv speakers don't add. Would work well with surround sound speaker additions.
414.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

415.author: Biozen
415.review: A little pricey but you have to expect a premium for Bose. The clarity of sound is extremely noticeable, especially with the voice enhancement option. The voice enhancement button is the one with the circular arrow in it in the middle of the controller.
415.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

416.author: Charlie
416.review_title: Great sound bar for the price
416.review: I had already read several reviews on this bar so was looking forward to taking it home and checking it out myself. I was pleasantly glad to agree with most that it was definitely worth the price compared to my old one. Would definitely recommend it if your wanting good enough sound without a sub woofer
416.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

417.author: rjfinva
417.review: I have a late model Sony flat screen and the "universal" remote that comes with the package will not completely link up with the TV or the Cox high speed cable box.. If Bose can't make a remote that will hook up with a Sony or a major cable company, it's garbage. Now I have to pack the thing up and take it back.
417.recommend: No, I would not recommend this to a friend

418.author: Haybud
418.review: I was skeptical about the sound quality from a soundbar without a separate subwoofer. But of course, Bose makes up for it with incredible sound quality and decent bass from this small unit. Perfect for small rooms and still gives that simulated 5.1 sound. Large living rooms may not produce the sound you want
418.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

419.author: Movie
419.review: We have our TV on a mantle and I needed a soundbar narrow enough to fit in between the TV stand arms. This fits perfect. Although it doesn't have the rich bass that you get with stand alone subs, it connects easy & we love the bluetooth connectivity. We stream pandora from a phone or computer through it frequently.
419.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

420.author: Jenn
420.review: This tiny sound bar is great on the sound but I bought this so that I can start my husbands new sound system and I thought that I would be able to add on pieces to it. But when I went back to look at additional pieces with him, I was told that that was not an option.
420.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

421.author: Pamannz
421.review: We were not looking for a soundbar but tried the demo at Best Buy & were hooked!! It has awesome rich sound. I love to have it on with all tv programs but you can really get the rich sound when watching action movies or listening to music. I also love that it has Bluetooth ability. Great soundbar for the money!!
421.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

422.author: NewbieTechie
422.review: When I walked into the store, I was looking for a sound bar add-on to my modest entertainment system. I ended up getting the Bose 5! Was sufficiently impressed to get another one 6 weeks later for the Entertainment Center in my Bedroom. Have never been disappointed by the Bose brand.
422.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

423.author: QTIP
423.review: I have 2 pair of Bose headphones and I needed a soundbar for my tv I looked at other products and I tried out beats before buying and making my final purchase I loved the way my headphones sound so I went with Bose I live it it's the best soundbar I've bought the sound is amazing a bit pricey but well worth it
423.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

424.author: Jimmie
424.review: I am not a Bose fan boy but I will have to admit that this soundbar is great. I am using it under my fireplace mounted TV so it is just sitting on my mantle. It really does sound good and it fills the room very well.
424.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

425.author: Farmboy
425.review: Bought the Bose as a supplemental speaker for the bedroom TV. Small profile and decent sound. Have had Bose products before and the sound quality is not as good as expected but definitely adequate for my needs. Works well if you don't want an external sub or a large amount of equipment clutter.
425.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

426.author: LFoster78
426.review: Purchased this item as a replacement for our old surround sound system. Easy installation and set up, takes up very little space. Sound is good for TV shows but found it lacking for DVD's and Blu-Ray. Will try out other movies incase of possible defects with discs but am considering going back to the surround sound system.
426.recommend: No, I would not recommend this to a friend

427.author: Judy
427.review: Love the sound bar no complaints. The only issue is integrating it w directv controller. When you turn on the television w the directv remote the bar does not automatically power up. But when you use directv remote to turn off the television the bar does power off. So I have to keep track of two controllers now
427.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

428.author: CDT68
428.review: Have been a Bose owner for the past few years. When I purchased a new TV I also needed a soundbar to replace my old system. I naturally went with Bose. Very happy so far. Extremely easy to set up!! Sound is nice for what it is. Was hoping for a little more base in the unit but do love the dialogue portion of the unit!
428.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

429.author: ladyebouton
429.review_title: Not as great as I expected from Bose
429.review:
Sounded great in the store, but the one I brought home doesn't have the clear sound I expect from Bose. Seems muffled unless I turn on the 
speech enhancer. For music, it's not a lot better than the IHome speaker I have for my IPod, which cost less than $100 vs the almost $300 for the Bose.
429.recommend: No, I would not recommend this to a friend

430.author: ps66
430.review: The device works as expected. The controller is problematic. I am using the controller to turn the speakers on and off. The instructions indicate the controller can be used to turn other parts of my TV system on and off. I have not succeeded in doing so; yes I read the directions..
430.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

431.author: kari808
431.review: I purchased this and could not be happier. Sound is great and the universal remote makes it a lot easier to control the sound bar and all my other electronics. Super easy to connect and start using. i love the fact its just the bar, which is a perfect size for a compact space, and still sounds great
431.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

432.author: mrod
432.review:
The Bose Solo5 has a better and clearer sound than the television. 
It's great for sports games and shows but even with a bass boosts it doesn't have that boom that classic big speakers have. 
For the price I could have bought a reciever with some good bookshelf speakers and gotten the movie boom I'm looking for.
432.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

433.author: Barn
433.review: Bose is always a consistent top quality sound speaker and this one fits the mold. I hooked it up as a soundbar for a flat screen tv but via wifi can channel music from my phone and listen to any source of music, plus its easily unplugged and used anywhere I need a great sound system in my house via the wifi option.
433.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

434.author: Speakers
434.review: Bought this on sale for $199. This is all you need for movies. Voices are clear and sharp. I also bought a bose subwoofer however I always have it low. Try it first before getting a sub. If you feel you need it go from there.
434.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

435.author: Romer
435.review: This has a good sound quality, but I was not told that it does not sync with my also purchased Sony TV. That is disappointing. The Geek Squad person that came and installed it did a good job, but he knew that it was not the best match for my new TV. Disappointing! I should have purchased a Sony sound bar.
435.recommend: No, I would not recommend this to a friend

436.author: Dian42
436.review: I love my Bose solo 5 sound bar. It puts the sound in front of my television so I hear everything clearly. Before my sound bar, I was always raising the sound level to hear the dialogue and then had to turn down the sound for music and action. Now I can now leave at same level.
436.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

437.author: Oberstein
437.review: I bought this and ended up returning it. The reason is for our larger living room it just didnt have enough bass. That said, if you want a TV spreaker replacement where you can clearly what people are saying this is an option. I think its better suited for small to medium size rooms, again the bass is lacking a bit.
437.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

438.author: DBELL
438.review: This is the first soundbar that we had purchased, and the quality and sound is exquisite. The price was very reasonable for a Bose product. I bought a paid of headphones by Bose a year ago to watch a movie on a plane and that is the only thing I hear as the soundbar goes we feel like we are in a move theater .
438.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

439.author: Sandjam
439.review: I have other Bose products which are great but this is not up to their sound quality by any means. You can get a lot better full soundbar and subwoofer package from other manufacturers that sound 10 times better for same price. Don't waste you time on this one.
439.recommend: No, I would not recommend this to a friend

440.author: LeslieReyn
440.review: I specifically needed a bar that would not cover the on/off sensor on the bottom edge of my existing TV. This sound bar was perfect and provides good sound (maybe even better but I don't turn it up really loud) and even has a vocal clarity feature to reduce the base and make talk based shows easier to hear.
440.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

441.author: Boater
441.review: We first bought a lower end sound bar but it wasn't good enough - we still couldn't hear the voices clear enough. We returned that one and bought the Bose. It does the trick and has a voice amplifier to make it even easier to pick up voice over the background noises. Easy to use remote. Great product..
441.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

442.author: Pollito
442.review:
Its small size will appeal to some, but even at this price, we want more from it in the performance stakes
The Good:
Compact size
Easy to use
Universal remote included
Good clarity to dialogue
The Bad:
Lacks punch
Narrow soundfield
Not very dynamic
Not a vast improvement on standard TV sound
442.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

443.author: MarshalD68
443.review: I was really skeptical at first of just a bar producing great sound. I had previously owned a Bose system that had 2 speakers and a big subwoofer and it was great. To my surprise Bose did it again. I am very impressed with the sound quality that the bar offers. It is a great deal for the price and the Bose name!
443.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

444.author: Ladybug847
444.review: This soundbar works good just don’t like the remote but was able to program in into my comcast remote. The only thing I wish that that had do was made it hdmi. Had to buy a new optical cord that was better (monster) and that did make the sound better
444.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

445.author: Laxy
445.review: This sound bar is awesome!! Sound is great. You don't need a super long sound bar with a sub. The base on this is great. The remote is an added bonus. Works all my components. Able to power all on and power off with one button. Playing Bluetooth sounds great!!! So easy to use. Bose never lets me down.
445.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

446.author: LBarnes
446.review: My TV is mounted over the fireplace and the sound is muffled so I purchased this to help. I don't love it, but it gets the job done. I have very nice speakers and surround sound on my lower level and just this sound bar in my living room. Also sometimes the sound seems a bit off from the lips of the characters.
446.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

447.author: happycustomer
447.review: I was skeptical as I've owned other brands in the past, but this sound bar was worth every penny. You can tone it down for general listening or up for theater sound when watching movies or listening to music and the clarity is top notch. Would highly recommend this item and would purchase another!
447.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

448.author: George1955
448.review: AFTER CONSIDERING MANY DIFFERENT SOUNDBARS TO ENHANCE THE SOUND ON MY TV, i DECIDED ON TYHE BOSE MODEL i BOUGHT- MUCH MORE EXPENSIVE BUT CLEARLY ENGINEERED BETTER - BOSE KNOWS SOUND - I'M GLAD MY LOCAL STORE HAD IT SET UP TO LISTEN TO IT.
448.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

449.author: SKANN
449.review_title: Great sound quality at affordable price
449.review: Purchased this at a best buy store. I was looking for more sound for watching TV and movies. Adding this really enhanced the sound and really happy about it. There is another model that has a sub woofer built into it, but this was enough for my small living room and really filled with great quality sound.
449.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

450.author: Mikey
450.review: Reviewed for quality and good sound and found this. Plug in took about 2 minutes. Only issue is you have to reset box for enhanced sound, but all from the remote so no big deal. I woulld recommend speaker to all in the lookout for better richer enhanced sound to your flat screen.
450.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

451.author: BBcust
451.review: This is a nice and innocuous sound bar which is great when watching movies. I don't feel the need to turn it on for regular TV shows although it also improves them. The only negative is that there is one more remote to deal with now because it does not handle all the functions of the xfinity remote.
451.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

452.author: Shortcake360
452.review: We have several Bose products in our home and vehicles. The Bose Solo 5 is a great addition to our collection. Sound bar does well in our garage with our cells and works with the cable box. I made the right decision going with this. I definetly scored best wifey points!
452.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

453.author: Kritter1
453.review: Good sound and good volume. I don't know about action shows, but, we were looking for a good sound bar that won't scare the dogs. So far, so good .... except for door knocks and door bells. Proves it sounds real! This is used in a large living room with no problems.
453.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

454.author: Brwebstats
454.review: I love this soundbar, it is easy to hook up and takes up very little space. The sound is as good or better than the one I was using that had full surround speakers. I decided to replace the old one because I didn't want wires everywhere. This Bose looks great and sounds better. Well worth the money.
454.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

455.author: Miki
455.review_title: Great for upgrading the volume on movies and tv sh
455.review: I highly recommend this soundbar. This soundbar satisfied my tv volume during tv shows and movies on my bluray dvd. Without the soundbar my tv even on 33 can bearly hear the tv or movie characters speaking. With the soundbar on the volume for both tv and bluray dvd can be on 7 to hear everything.
455.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

456.author: Ramdinesh
456.review: I'm having Samsung LED TV and other DVD player and game consoles and dish tv... over all I end up 4 remotes... in not ready go with another remote for my Sound system with big remote. Even though Boss says one remote... I'm not getting boss international warranty and service support...
456.recommend: No, I would not recommend this to a friend

457.author: gfmack13
457.review_title: I like the Solo 5 TV Soundbar quite a bit
457.review: The Solo 5 TV Soundbar is a good product. It was extremely easy to hook up to our TV. I like the BlueTooth feature. It sounds really good, although I would maybe like a bit more bass, especially for playing music. Overall though, I prefer having just the one piece rather than a sub woofer and bar.
457.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

458.author: Saks
458.review: Even though I had read reviews online before I bought, I figured i’d Give it a try. The reviews were right. Even at the highest volume, the sound output was way too low. I have tiny cheap Bluetooth speakers that are way better. Surprised since this was a Bose.
458.recommend: No, I would not recommend this to a friend

459.author: C1rdp
459.review: Bought to improve tv sounds. Not up to my expectations. Decent sound quality but very limited ability to choose desired output ranges. Using the improved dialogue feature cuts out higher bass sounds. Doesn't deliver clear dialogue and booming bass sounds. No indication of volume level.
459.recommend: No, I would not recommend this to a friend

460.author: Willybird
460.review_title: Sounds OK, but has Limited Volume Increase
460.review: I purchased this soundbar to enhance the limited output from a UHD TV, but at times I found little difference in the sound level. The bass is sometimes a bit muddy, but there. I will mark this as recommended, but would explain the speaker's behavior first.
460.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

461.author: Vic673
461.review: The Bose Solo 5 Sound Bar has many features. It also has three different ports for all of your sound needs even a usb port. The sound bar also comes with a universal remote which include extra functions, such as the blue tooth feature.
461.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

462.author: Cos12
462.review: Being hard of hearing, I have always had trouble "making out" what the TV commentators or actors were saying. This Bose Sound bar has made all the difference. I can now listen to the news or sportscasters and finally hear and understand what they are saying. Highly recommended!
462.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

463.author: DahDah
463.review: We have an older television with the speakers at the rear of the television. Horrible sound quality and very hard to hear. Very exciting to clearly hear the television with this Bose soundbar! Great sound quality and volume control. Very affordable and easy to install and use.
463.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

464.author: Salinwa
464.review: We bought and returned this. It’s a really great speaker but the tv we bought has really great sound so we really could not justify the speaker purchase. But if your in the market for a speaker I highly recommend this one! Hope this helps.
464.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

465.author: Sharath
465.review: I bought this this thinking Bose will have the best sound no matter how small it is. But sadly it disappointed me in the bass department. It's good enogh for a small room. But really let's u down in big rooms. But the clarity of music and voice is incredible.
465.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

466.author: Craig
466.review: I purchased this for a wall mounted TV that is inset in a wall of bookcases in a large living room with 20 foot ceilings. It does ok. But, the volume can't go loud enough for a larger room. It's ok for hearing conversations, but doesn't project background sounds that you would expect to hear in movies.
466.recommend: No, I would not recommend this to a friend

467.author: Dman
467.review: One of the reasons I chose my new TV was its internal speaker is rated above average. I decided to see if I could get clearer dialogue and the Bose does the job. Great sound in a very compact bar.
467.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

468.author: Onlineshopper23
468.review: For such a little soundbar i could not believe the sound that came out of it after buying the soundtouch 300 I needed a sound bar for the bedroom. Being short on space for one i bought the solo 5 and am glad I spent the money and went with bose. I think the price point on it is fair!
468.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

469.author: TustinyMom
469.review_title: It's a great speaker but hard to set up
469.review: The clarity of this speaker is terrific. But the directions for connecting it to the entertainment system are hard to understand and contradictory. So now I can watch movies or TV, but I'm not able to listen to my dvds or the radio setting on the receiver.
469.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

470.author: DonM
470.review: I enjoy Bose products, but didn't have the need for elaborate system, nor wanted the expense, but DO want Great sound, from the TV, in realativly small room. This speaker is perfect. Would highly recommend. Also has bluetooth to connect with other devices, without the TV. Can't beat it, I say!
470.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

471.author: Tammy
471.review: The first one we purchased had a horrible noise emitting from it and had to be returned. This one seems to be working good. The only complaint is that it doesn't make the spoken word as clear as Bose claimed with the lower volumes (which is the main reason we purchased this brand over others)
471.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

472.author: Markiie
472.review: Bought this for my bedroom TV because I was having difficulty heading voices when there was background music or other noise. The voice clarity move does that well while music continues in the background. Compact unit that fits on a 24 inch TV table nicely.
472.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

473.author: CbKS
473.review: I expected a Bose sound, which this delivers. Listened to it in the store to compare the Bose to sound systems with multiple speakers, but the sound for this one was still very good and of course takes up less room. Sounds much better than the previous model.
473.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

474.author: Cautiousbuyer
474.review: Good sound quality considering the size don't need to have the base up too loud, love the dialogue feature to watch programs, every word is very clear. Only qualm is that the universal is very large and clunky.
474.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

475.author: jvreiner
475.review: Bose products are always good. This sound bar might look small but the sound is not. It has been really great to program the remote as it is actually a universal remote that now allows me to not have to use the DirectTV remote and then a separate remote for the sound bar. Great buy all around.
475.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

476.author: VeeTay
476.review: I got tired of the sound only from the tv and decided to branch out. Although I was not quite ready to do the surround sound tbing, I was told this was a good start. This Bise sound bar was definitely the ticket. The sound is rich and clear. I will be getting another one for the bedroom.
476.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

477.author: Elflaquito
477.review: You cannot get any better than this soundbar. Bose has the best products out there. We compared other brands and you can hear the components rattle on the other brands once the volume reaches a certain level. This soundbar has a clear sound and makes watching movies and shows way better.
477.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

478.author: llennoco
478.review: This sound bar was marginally different from my Samsung TV's speakers but not what you think of as "better." I've heard Bose speakers in many setups and this was not nearly the high quality I'd expect from a Bose product.
478.recommend: No, I would not recommend this to a friend

479.author: Nightwolf
479.review: I was disappointed when I first unpacked it. I had been told in the store that it would attach to my TV, when in fact it would not. After looking into it a bit farther I found that a wall mount could be bought for it for another small investment and decided to keep it. I'm glad I did. I love it!
479.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

480.author: 808NickJr
480.review: This Bose soundbar may be small compared to all the other soundbars out on the market but let me tell you, it sounds GREAT!!! Clear, crisp sound with that bass (not the annoying bass that other brands have)...BOSE is awesome!!! Can never go wrong with a BOSE.
480.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

481.author: Collincool
481.review_title: Not as loud as I expected
481.review: I was expecting a louder and better sound from Bose...but for the sale price that I paid it is worth it, but I would not pay full retail for this item. It does have a lot of bells and whistles that I don't need....just want something better than my tv's speakers and this does that much.
481.recommend: No, I would not recommend this to a friend

482.author: PaWan
482.review_title: Great fit for small and medium room
482.review:
Easy to install, easy to setup and easy to configure. Its compact so can fit anywhere, the sound and bass is perfect for any average size room.

It just takes 2 minutes to bind your other devices with the universal remote.

A perfect purchase in a perfect price range.
482.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

483.author: VDog
483.review_title: Great Sound Bar for a Small Room
483.review: This sound bar is simple to set up and for the cost, provides great sound. We purchased to use in a small bedroom TV used mainly for video games. The sound quality is crisp and clear at low and high volumes. I would not recommend this for a large room, but it is perfect for those bedroom TVs.
483.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

484.author: QUIQUE
484.review: After testing and reviewing a few sound bars I never thought this little unit could sound so great the tv audio is really awesome is not a lot of base but that's when the wireless sub comes in and there you go a compleat home theater system and you don't have to break your wallet.
484.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

485.author: autumnsky
485.review:
Wow, :)
it's a bose so need I say more? The sound is nothing short of amazing which I expect nothing less from bose. Yes, while it's certainly true, it's pricey; you get what you pay for. It is a high end product which truly changes movie, music, and tv experience! Will not dissapoint!
485.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

486.author: Petediddy
486.review: I prefer Bose speakers over all others however the cost can be prohibited. Purchased this sound bar at Best Buy for a Samsung TV and it was less expensive than the Samsung brand. Easy to connect to the TV (Samsung MU8000). Sounds Great!
486.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

487.author: WalkonAir
487.review: The sound difference for films is amazing and will transform even a small TV. It was easy to install, and was up and running in minutes. If you are looking for a boost in sound quality, but don't want to have the larger systems, this will work out great for most people.
487.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

488.author: Drock24
488.review_title: Perfect for what I'm using it for
488.review: I personally love the sound Bose speakers put out and after upgrading the tv in the bedroom I had to upgrade the sound as well. I mostly use it for tv and movies, this sound bar might look little but it can get loud. Setup was very easy and came with the cable for the job.
488.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

489.author: Jcb64
489.review_title: Great sound , deep bass and good range
489.review: I bought this for a bedroom to compliment a 55 inch TV the sound is true and rich , the bedroom is fairly large but the system handles this perfectly and handles voice, music and Cinema without effort. The remote is a little large but covers many devices .
489.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

490.author: ErnDog
490.review_title: Front firing speakers only. No directional effect
490.review: I own the original Bose Solo and love the fact that in addition to front firing speakers, they have two that fire to the sides. The effect is like surround sound. You hear sounds that seem to come from directions where there are no speakers.
490.recommend: No, I would not recommend this to a friend

491.author: AROONEY
491.review: This speaker is everything and more I could ever want! My TV speakers were not working as well as they should be, so I decided to do some research on the best sound bars. When I found this one I was very hopefully it would be the best, and thankfully it is awesome!
491.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

492.author: LAndrews
492.review: This soundbar was the best addition to my entertainment center. The sounds are crisp even when playing video games. My dog thinks that someone is in the house because the surround sound is that good.
492.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

493.author: catzim
493.review: You cannot beat the sound on Bose products. My TV has poor sound quality. My Bose sound bar has corrected the problem. I like that you can change the settings to enhance dialogues, helps my husband hear what they are saying without cranking up the volume.
493.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

494.author: Christypoo
494.review_title: The cordless dyson animal is great!
494.review: The cordless dyson animal is great! It has the suction to pick up dog hair on hard floors without blowing it everywhere as well as getting deep into the carpet! The battery life is great for doing just part or even the whole house! Me and 3 other members have one and we love them!
494.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

495.author: APvabeach
495.review: Honestly all TV's should come stock with this soundbar. It projects voices and music perfectly with minimal bass. I would highly recommend it to old people or people who live in multiple floor apartments. If you want something with bass that blows you away this isn't for you.
495.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

496.author: Rajesh
496.review: It's a good sound bar especially for small rooms. Works as advertised and very simple to set-up. I mainly use this for streaming Movies and TV shows online. Universal remote is a plus, but I prefer to use my XBox One remote while streaming to control my TV, XBox, and Bose Soundbar.
496.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

497.author: roxMstar
497.review: The quality of sound is terrible. Not nearly worth what was paid for it. I was so unhappy that I had to return it within a couple days. Quality rivals a bluetooth speaker found at 5 Below. Don't waste your time.
497.recommend: No, I would not recommend this to a friend

498.author: kittie2176
498.review: For the price, it's a decent little soundbar. However, don't expect something super fantastic. It's mildly better than the built-in speakers on our TV. However, since our speakers are on the rear of the TV, I feel like it's a better option.
498.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

499.author: RMN65
499.review: Bose qualtiy sound is still there and best others at this price range. Volume doens't go as loud as others so depends on where you plan on putting it and how much sound you need. The quality of the sound is what is worth the purchase compared to all others. Worth the purchase.
499.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

500.author: DrP2
500.review: I needed a sound bar with the dimensions offered by the Bose Solo 5. Being partial to Bose products, the choice of the Solo 5 was easy to make. It has great sound for its size. It’s other sound manipulating options are nice also. A good buy.
500.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

501.author: Vollmer
501.review: This Bose sound bar goes beyond high quality audio, especially for the price. Wether your listening to music, gaming, or enjoying your favorite Tv show and or movie. This product delivers crystal clear sound with clarity and is truly an immersive experience.
501.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

502.author: rickkrik
502.review_title: So Happy I Chose a Bose Soundbar
502.review: This soundbar was recommended by a Best Buy technical expert. I had originally planned to purchase a Samsung soundbar to go with my Samsung TV but after listening to this one I went with Bose. Such spectacular sound from such a small bar.
502.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

503.author: jswoodruff
503.review: i have bought bose in all my house they are all great if your looking for something compact for a small room without the bulk of a full surround this is the one i bought it for my huge bed room and it fits the bill just dont expect a loud speaker but its very efficient for what it is
503.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

504.author: SparkyTX
504.review:
I purchased this to provide more audio quality then my Sony 40" TV.

It was not much louder then the TV when bar was as loud it would go. TV went louder then soundbar.

I did connect it to Bluetooth to my iPhone and it was slightly better but not what I was hoping for.
504.recommend: No, I would not recommend this to a friend

505.author: CSM76
505.review: My tv speakers are in the back so it was always hard to hear. We bought this sound bar a few weeks ago and it’s perfect! The sound is great and we love the universal remote that came with it. Great sound for a pretty reasonable price!
505.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

506.author: Jennyb
506.review: Love this sound bar. My current TV plays the background music or sound effects over peoples voices so it’s hard to here with my new Bose sound bar I can hear people talking clearly now !
506.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

507.author: Miami2015
507.review: If you're looking for a sound bar that doesn't use a subwoffer this is the one and at a great price. It's easy to setup and gives step by step instructions to program all devices to the Bose remote. The sound is good and can get loud but stays clear at any volume.
507.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

508.author: Swymonster
508.review: Purchased for TV in a 12 x 124Den. Sound quality is great. Not sure if this sound bar would be for a larger room, say a living room. Very happy with purchase. Setup a breeze and remote can be used as a universal remote which makes it very convenient.
508.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

509.author: contrain
509.review: Great sound for a small sound bar, able to hear more clearly. Only drawback is that there is nothing that shows you the volume level as on other sound bars so it's difficult to always know what the correct level is without raising or lowering the volume as you adjust it.
509.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

510.author: Mani
510.review:
Bought Bose sound bar and is very good for small room but not big room.
It does the job remote is very good and can be configured for all devices - which is good but you will need that code for all devices to configure the remote.
Good product and would definitely recommend.
Thanks
510.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

511.author: SusieQ
511.review: Both my husband and I were having difficulty hearing our TV so we thought we would try the Bose speaker. It has made all the difference in the world with the clarity of conversation. No longer a need to raise the volume. Try it, you’ll be glad you did.
511.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

512.author: David
512.review_title: Overall completely satisfied with this soundbar
512.review: This brand has always been one of my favorites, not because of its name but because of the product performance. I knew that buying this soundbar with my new tv, I'd be completely satisfied. Awesome product and sound.
512.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

513.author: frenchie2u
513.review: I've got a Bose Acousticwave and companion 2 systems, and both ROCK, the Solo 5 was a disappointment, the speakers on the TV was 5X louder and cleaner than the Bose 5, in my opinion, select something else if you want to have loud sound
513.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

514.author: AnnieK
514.review: Excellent reputation. It has only been a week since we have the system, but it was easy to install, and the sound overall is very good. It does not have a subwoofer and so the base is not as heavy, however, for every day television watching which I use it for, it is very good.
514.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

515.author: Ray60
515.review_title: Good sound bar for improving dialogue sound
515.review: Easy to hookup, came with optical cable. In the dialogue mode the sound was greatly improved for hearing the actors talking. Still always can't hear everything, I just think that's the way they make movies now. To much background sound effects.
515.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

516.author: GRUMMAN14
516.review: I ended up purchasing a total of 3 Bose Soundbar Solo 5. I like the size and the sound. It’s got clarity and bass equally and very well. It’s definitely a good thing for a high end tv that lacks good built in speakers. Well worth the money.
516.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

517.author: oldgoosehunter
517.review_title: Does have better sound than tv speakers
517.review: I was able to program Bose remote to Direct TV but not Direct TV to Bose sound bar. Doesn't have loud volume on some Direct TV stations and sometimes on Netflix movies. I would like some indicator for volume level and bass level so once I find a level I like I could return to it easily.
517.recommend: No, I would not recommend this to a friend

518.author: PatS
518.review: We bought this at the same time we purchased a new TV. We were instantly sold on it when we heard its sound. It makes hearing the sound on the TV much easier and we also enjoy the fact that we can use the music on the iPad to play through this sound bar. The sound is fantastic!
518.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

519.author: BBFAN
519.review: I bought this one as PC speaker. First time, I connected it with 3.5mm audio cable, sound quality below the average. After I connected with optical cable, the sound is much better. The volume is kind of low. The size is perfect to put this sound bar under monitor.
519.recommend: No, I would not recommend this to a friend

520.author: JMPW
520.review_title: Sound not quite what I hoped
520.review: I was disappointed at the sound quality of this Bose product. The size fit perfect in the space I had, but hoped for a richer effect. Had to go to the maximum bass setting to get a reasonable sound.
520.recommend: No, I would not recommend this to a friend

521.author: MsBon
521.review: Got this for my dad, who's hard of hearing. We were very impressed with the dialog button which enhances sound when he's listening to conversations on television. I would recommend this sound bar for HD televisions which may need an additional boost for sound quality.
521.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

522.author: InstructorBob
522.review: I am using this for the audio of my 40" TV in a guest bedroom. Perfect for the application. Fills the guest room with rich sound and allows guest to connect via Bluetooth to their personal devices for music. Doesn't take up a lot of space and looks clean and cable free
522.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

523.author: Grandmother
523.review: It works, but only independently from the Smart TV it's connected to. It can't be controlled by the TV or Set-Top Box. The BASS has to be turned down upon each use before the Dialouge button is used. I wouldn't buy it again. Bose needs to put more work
523.recommend: No, I would not recommend this to a friend

524.author: Aaron
524.review_title: Blue tooth awesome but over all not enough volume
524.review: Sound quality was great, blue tooth feature was great but over all not much more than what the TV provided. I thought that it would be an economical solution, but I returned it because I’m willing to spend a little more to get a little more.
524.recommend: No, I would not recommend this to a friend

525.author: ramyar
525.review:
We bought this for a friends wedding since they just moved to a new apartment and they love it ! 
It's just right for a decent apartment and they feel like it's a home theater environment! it is really good for that price and we would definitely recommend it !
525.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

526.author: Randy
526.review: Again, you just can't go wrong with Bose!! I needed a small soundbar or external speakers for my TV location and I saw the Solo 5 on display at Best Buy. I played with it and was sold on it. Perfect for my requirement.
526.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

527.author: Jennie
527.review: So pleased with this purchase! Pricing competitive - sales reps. knowledgeable, helpful...but not pushy. Listen carefully to customers wants, needs & concerns. Great display of product lines. These items were perfect for me & did not disappoint. Thank you!
527.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

528.author: SwiftnessStudios
528.review: I love this speaker so much! It has a great sound and looks great. It has a rich sound quality and I love the snooze feature on it if not in use. I connect my phone to Bluetooth and listen to music through it. It's the only speaker you need. Love it! ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
528.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

529.author: timjf
529.review: This was a purchase I made on impulse after buying a flatscreen tv. Most tv sets have poor sound, but this unit makes the listening experience a pleasurable one. It also has bluetooth communication, so it can play anything from a smartphone.
529.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

530.author: Srini
530.review:
Very good speaker for your TV...even though I have a Sony TV, the speakers from the TV are very noisy and poor quality.

This BOSE speaker really rocks while listening to Music, Movies and YouTube watching. We all love it
530.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

531.author: Dott
531.review: I am very disaspointed in BOSE as I am a long time BOSE lover .what happened to the quality on the brand.I have a 321 for almost 10 years and its still PERFECT.I upgraded my Family Room sound and NOTHING it sounded week and like a transistor radio..regroup..somebody messed up
531.recommend: No, I would not recommend this to a friend

532.author: Spikeka
532.review: I bought this because my husband is a little hard of hearing and had trouble understanding what they were saying on tv because the background music was so loud, this sound bar helps to tone down background music so the speech is easier to hear, works great !!!
532.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

533.author: HappyBuyer
533.review: An excellent sound bar and no need for all of the additional speakers other brands offer as this one bar does it all. Our 60 inch tv has a great picture but sounded horrible. Really horrible. With the Bose sound bar we can now enjoy watching tv like we were always suppose too.
533.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

534.author: geemz
534.review: I upgraded my old Bose 321 system with this Solo 5 system and am very happy with it. Very simple to set up and more than adequate enough sound to fill the room. The sound was also excellent when streaming music to it. The soundbar hardly takes up any space on my tv stand.
534.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

535.author: Salya
535.review: Take it from a Navy Veteran who has lost my hear, this Bose brings out clear crisp clear voices and the surround sound in 2.1 is very nice for a 800 square foot man cave with plenty of bass......worth the money
535.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

536.author: tss222
536.review_title: The unit is compact but sounds awesome.
536.review: The unit is compact but sounds much larger with great clarity. It was very easy to set up and is far superior to the rear speakers on my tv. It did take a little research to enable my comcast remote to control the on/off and volume of the speaker, but is working fine.
536.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

537.author: bravesrock
537.review_title: Small, Loud and Works at all Volatages
537.review: I needed a soundbar which was small and loud and would work at both 110V and 220V. This is the only one in the market that fit the bill. I wish it had a LCD screen in the front that could give me some feedback when I'm operating the remote.
537.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

538.author: DustinPaul
538.review_title: Hardly can call it a bose
538.review: This sound bar was honestly cheap. I own many Bose products and I was disappointed with the quality it put out... I had it up as far as it would go and it still sounded almost identical to the tvs regular output speakers... bose was just a name on the product. I took it back.
538.recommend: No, I would not recommend this to a friend

539.author: GrandmaV
539.review_title: I needed a little help with the British accents
539.review: I have bad tinnitus and some hearing loss but I love the PBS and BBC shows. The dialog feature is just what I needed. It also is a reasonable size to sit in front of my TV. My cable has music channels and it will improve them too.
539.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

540.author: Molly
540.review: Love this soundbar - has great range, especially since I boosted the base like the nice man at the store told me to as I checked out. Easy to set up, easy to use, just wish I could figure out how to get a picture of the volume on the screen when I'm adjusting the volume.
540.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

541.author: Loosenut
541.review_title: Excellent sound in a small package
541.review: The Bose Solo 5 is a small sound bar compared to most but delivers excellent surround sound. Easy to connect, just plug in the power and connect the optical sound cable. It also has Bluetooth capability as a plus!!
541.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

542.author: brycov
542.review: I was disappointed in the performance of the Bose Solo 5 that I purchased. The volume of the sound was very low (and could not be raised) so I had to return it. The unit had very little capability in creating a stereo effect as the speaker sound appeared to be in mono.
542.recommend: No, I would not recommend this to a friend

543.author: SteveO63
543.review: Great quality Bose sound and 1 cable hook up. Voices are much clearer and amplification of all sounds is dramatically improved over tv speakers. If you're looking for booming base then no. If you want clean sound, simple design and very easy hook up then definitely yes.
543.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

544.author: RIshi
544.review_title: Excellent Sound as expected from Bose!
544.review:
Excellent Sound as expected from Bose! Very Happy to choose this sound bar for my TV. It will totally change your experience of watching TV/Music Video by adding an excellent sound to it. 
Recommended for sure!
544.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

545.author: Phyzed
545.review: This speaker is great, sound packs a punch, quality low end without a sub, perfect for small spaces. Easy, one optical chord to connect and you have an amazing sound enhancement!
545.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

546.author: past
546.review: If you enjoy bass this is not for you. Compact and easy to set up and the sound is good. I don't understand why you have to purchase a separate wall hanging kit, I think it should come with it. Just another way to add to the purchase price.
546.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

547.author: mrbill
547.review: The sound from the new speakers allow me to hear what is being said now, instead of the music over riding the voices. The voice quality on my HDTV is poor at best. Not anymore. Love my New Bose' speakers. Two thumbs up. Bose' did a great job.
547.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

548.author: GINGER
548.review_title: GREAT SOUND FOR AN AFFORDABLE PRICE
548.review:
AFTER STRUGGLING TO HEAR DIALOG ON OUR BIG FLATSCREEN FOR MONTHS, WE DECIDED ON THIS SOUNDBAR PARTICULARLY BECAUSE IT DIDN'T HAVE A SEPARATE SUBWOOFER. ON-LINE REVIEWS WERE GOOD, IT WAS VERY AFFORDABLE AND SMALL.
OUR FRIEND ALSO PURCHASED IT AFTER OUR GOOD EXPERIENCE.
548.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

549.author: HugeBuddah
549.review: It's just ok. Not very robust, and not nearly as loud as I anticipated. My Beats boom box is way louder and richer than this sound bar. The first Bose product I have ever been disappointed with. I bought this item because of the price though, and you get what you pay for!
549.recommend: No, I would not recommend this to a friend

550.author: Dadeo
550.review_title: Good sound for dialog, Very good remote
550.review: As I am a bit older, many actors on TV shows appear to whisper, or voices are muffled. This sound bar has resolved that situation. I did have to raise the base a little. The Bose remote also controls my Optimum cable box functions completely.....
550.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

551.author: KimS
551.review: I have a small living room and no need for surroundsound. The sound bar brings out the voices over the background in movies. And listening to music with the Bluetooth, sound is awesome. Highly recommend.
551.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

552.author: Babe
552.review: I have had several sound bars, and none has performed as well as this Bose. Have already recommended it to several neighbors and relatives who have all purchased it and love it.
552.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

553.author: Hank
553.review_title: Overrated since there was was no great improvemen.
553.review: This is only a modest improvement over the speakers on my Sony 40" TV. I was unable to program the remote to operate the TV and Directv on the Bose device even though I followed all directions and must use two remotes to control both my TV and Directv receiver.
553.recommend: No, I would not recommend this to a friend

554.author: Univek14
554.review: Great sound from a compact soundbar. Easy to set up, greatly improved sound from built in speakers from TV. Includes optical connection. Remote easy to program for TV, Cable, DVD. Definitely recommend for anyone looking for a simple alternative to a complete surround setup.
554.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

555.author: touchdown
555.review: I had purchased a different brand sound bar. It was dissapointing so I took it back and Best Buy was great (save your receipts). It was an additional $90 but I should've spent that from the start. Bose might be a little more than some others but well worth it.
555.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

556.author: Roadman
556.review: This speaker is great for our 40" TV. Sound is clear with good bass for movies. Like the voice feature which enhances the talking for easier listening. A little over priced but worth the money for the quality sound you receive.
556.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

557.author: RickBGA
557.review: I replaced my old soundbar because the Bose sounded better in the local BB store. I do not think this sound bar does as good with music as my old sound bar but dialog is much clearer. I wear hearing aids and the words seem to be crisper. I can follow the story lines better.
557.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

558.author: scotto
558.review_title: Good sound for a smaller room.
558.review: I bought this based soley on the brand name and prior experience with other bose speakers. A very good speaker for smaller rooms. My dimensions are 10 x 12 in the media room. I would not recommend it for anything much larger, such as a great room or basement man cave.
558.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

559.author: MSOMan
559.review: Very please with this purchase. As a musician I appreciate the sound quality of Bose. This soundbar has all the perks of having a fancy surround sound system, without paying for it. My dad came over and liked it so much he baught one.
559.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

560.author: TomJ
560.review_title: Great sound for a small box
560.review: The Bose Sono 5 Sound Bar was easy to install (power and sound plugs). Programmed the DVR remote to turn DVR, TV, and Sound Bar on/off with single button. Sound Bar has richer sound (better base). Great improvement of TV sound.
560.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

561.author: JackAttack
561.review: Absolutely love Bose speakers and this doesn't fail to change that opinion. While it is a smaller one, its perfect for a bed room or a small living room when you don't absolutely NEED a surround sound system. It still makes you feel immersed in the movie, song, or game.
561.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

562.author: Katrina
562.review: This speaker does not work with the sound touch system that Bose has. I discovered that while trying to hook it up....I bought it for that purpose and returned it since I bought the wrong item..Didn't want to give it a bad review since I never used it!
562.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

563.author: Sweet
563.review:
Compact size, easy to connect, fair bluetooth.

Sound--this is where I was disappointed. Narrow soundstage, overly warm soundstage. Control options helped, but did not bring the clarity and life hoped for, this soundbar is best in a very small room.
563.recommend: No, I would not recommend this to a friend

564.author: Belawoof
564.review: I love this sound bar. I cannot use a separate subwoofer because of tenants living below me. This sound bar is great and a lot better than the TV speakers. It’s very small too.
564.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

565.author: krish6239
565.review: I read the reviews before buying this and since I have a smaller living room, I decided to give it a try to get better sound, especially when I watched movies. The sound quality is excellent not just for TV shows and movies, but when I play music through it on my iPod.
565.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

566.author: jwill
566.review: This is just what I needed, but did not realize it. Sound is not great on big screen TV's, so I was always turning up or down on the remote. I have my Alexa Echo plugged into this and enjoy listening and great sound when playing music!
566.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

567.author: Angie
567.review: I have a small living room and didn't need anything too loud, as my TV volume is very low. With this it actually works better than expected. I swear when my kids play video games with this on it sounds like a war zone. I have to make them turn it off or very low.
567.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

568.author: mrpatrick
568.review: I needed a quality audio product for my kitchen/dining area. I did not want a separate subwoofer, this is the right size and it has a good clean sound with enough base to enjoy movies and music. We especially like the bluetooth with our Pandora.
568.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

569.author: JayMarsh7
569.review: The sound that comes out of this little sound bar is clear and precise, however lacks bass. This bar does not have a wired or wireless subwoofer and you can tell that it does not. Overall I am happy with this bar as I have an odd corner location for the install.
569.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

570.author: EMSGV
570.review: I purchased these bose soundbar with a new tv stand and new smart tv and I have to say that i made a good purchase. The soundbar sounds perfect for being compact. It's nice and loud. I would recommend this bose soundbar.
570.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

571.author: TexasHusker
571.review: I bought this as a gift for my parents after listening to the demo in the store. The sound that comes out of this sound Bar is great for the purpose of clarity and having a huge improvement from the TV Speakers. My parents love it and price is reasonable at $249.
571.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

572.author: flyingbob
572.review: Compared with the size of other sound bars, this one is more convenient, gives great sound to your TV and the blue tooth connectivity for my phone is a plus ... It has no sub woofer to find a spot for and so is really easy to accommodate if you have limited space.
572.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

573.author: tofuman22
573.review_title: Good clarity of dialogue with my LG TV
573.review: Went to the Best Buy store in Flagstaff to listen to speaker bars. The Bose sound the best. The sales person was very helpful. When I got home I set it up with the LG TV settings for speech. It sound very good with improved clarity.
573.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

574.author: Knotwise
574.review: Awesome sound bar. The quality is great. I didn't get it for the Bluetooth connectivity but that's been a plus. The only negative is I'd rather have a small dedicated remote rather than a huge universal one.
574.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

575.author: Bravofsm
575.review: This is a compact sound bar that does not take up much space and does a very nice job. It takes word clarity to another level which was very important to me as I have some hearing impairment. For a nice affordable upgrade to better sound I definitely recommend.
575.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

576.author: Noherr12
576.review_title: Bose sound not as good as I thought
576.review: I am an AT&T subscriber and the Bose makes a clicking sound whenever I use the remote to change channels or a pre recorded program. The Geek Squad told me that that particular provider hasn't caught up yet to the Bose equipment. It is very annoying
576.recommend: No, I would not recommend this to a friend

577.author: barefooter72
577.review: this speaker has a range that helps me hear the tv. I use 2 hearing aid and this speaker brings the sound out so that I can understand the words. well worth the investment.
577.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

578.author: Vswag
578.review: The Bose Solo 5 was very easy to set up and it sounds really good but it clearly is not what I expected in a small package from Bose. Bose is legendary for putting amazing sound in small packages but, overall, this soundbar dissapoints.
578.recommend: No, I would not recommend this to a friend

579.author: eagleye52
579.review_title: Sounds great. Easy to install and setup.
579.review:
I checked several other brands before choosing the Bose. I'd had other Bose speakers before and was confident that this would do what I needed.
The sound is clear and vibrant.
Setup and installation took no more than 15 minutes.
579.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

580.author: Ptrish
580.review_title: Great sound lives up to the Bose name
580.review: I am very pleased with the sound from this sound bar. The feature of the voice clarifier is a great function for me because it tones the bass down so that the voices are clearer. Great sound bar for the price
580.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

581.author: TequestaFL
581.review: We purchased a Sony 55" TV and found we had to turn up the volume loud just to make out the words. We purchased this Bose system and now can hear perfectly on low volume. It was well worth the money. Actually we received a price match from Best Buy that paid for it!
581.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

582.author: Chadwiki
582.review: This will not be great for a huge room, But for the bedroom it is a great improvement over the tv speakers, and a reasonable price. I am a big fan of Bose so I may be a little bias.
582.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

583.author: StealthFalken
583.review: I bought this particular speaker because I didn't want a big subwoofer in my room the design was small and sleek and looks good mounted on the wall the sound quality is amazing it really gives u movie quality sound. I am very happy with my purchase.
583.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

584.author: Norman
584.review: It's hard to believe how great the sound is coming from a sound bar. I was truly amazed how deep and rich the sound is, but what can I say it's a Bose. Very good quality and it will let you pair up to six Bluetooth devices. Very easy to set up and start enjoying!
584.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

585.author: devo
585.review: The sound bar sounds so much better than the tv, the universal remote allows you to program your dvd/bluray player but has No eject button. Huh? i will keep my bar but am disappointed that something so blatantly obvious was left out
585.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

586.author: Jessica
586.review: Sounds great. Enhanced sound effects experience thatbis much better than my TVs speakers. Easy to set up. Takes a while to get used to the syncing process. I hook it up to my tv and can use with my Bluetooth enabled record player Too!
586.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

587.author: Tintin
587.review: Have been looking for a good sound bar. I'm the favourite for Boss. I tried Samsung, VIZIO and Westington sound bars. Some how didn't like them. Finally, I ended up with Boss Sound Bar. This is the latest model in the market and suited perfectly for my requirement.
587.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

588.author: xsvmind
588.review: You can never go wrong with Bose. This compact sound bar surprisingly provides clear sound, nice mids/highs and enough bass to not completely miss the sub. Excellent purchase and would recommend to someone looking for quality sound, affordable price, and space saver.
588.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

589.author: BleusMom
589.review_title: We LOVE it. Affordably priced excellent sound.
589.review: This soundbar is excellent. We had purchased more expensive soundbars in the past and were never happy with the quality of the sound. The Bose Solo 5 is a must purchase for anyone looking to upgrade their TV viewing to theater and or sports arena sound quality.
589.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

590.author: Mizzou
590.review: I really liked the sound. Very easy setup. Really is plug in and play. I really like the Bluetooth feature and enjoy listening to my music from I-pad when not watching TV. However if you want lots of bass this is not for you. Bass was good and adequate for me
590.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

591.author: BrockieB
591.review: Bought this speaker hoping it would provide enough sound for the living room compared to the bigger speaker. As usual, Bose outdid my expectations and this speaker is awesome, lots of sound, great lows and highs.
591.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

592.author: JackpineMark
592.review: Great sound, easy set up and connection. Got this for use with Samsung 28” TV. Work well together and easy to program Bose remote to control TV and Bose sound bar.
592.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

593.author: GreekGod137
593.review_title: BOSE surround sound bar is awesome
593.review: The BOSE soundbar was easy to install and program. It fits perfectly in with the TV and the décor of the family room. The quality of sound is great and adequate for the space it is in. I'll probably get another one.
593.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

594.author: Wokiebear
594.review: Using the Solo 5 with my computer. Easy setup and connection, just had to discover a problem with the sound was needing to turn it up on the remote and setting the remote enable key.
594.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

595.author: TomOrlando
595.review: This is a great little sound system if you're not looking to fill up your room with large subwoofers and speakers. It has deep bass sounds while making it easier to hear conversations on tv. Sounds great with the Bluetooth capabilities as well.
595.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

596.author: Redheadedbooger
596.review: Ok everything that has to do with sound in my home has to be Bose. I love there products and I’m sure you will too. This sound bar took care of my sound problem in my bedroom. Now I have that great sound Bose is known for.
596.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

597.author: metamorphoses
597.review:
playback contains an overabundance of bass relative to treble - - with little ability to adjust - - the higher range output is swallowed-up.
also,
as with all-things-bose,
this bar is overpriced.
nevertheless:
it IS performing the task that i required.
597.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

598.author: SideCarOne
598.review: Hey, this Bose is great. For Bose, it has price thats right. The sound is wonderful for just a simple sound-bar. Love the cool sound. It has easy hookup and the bluetooth connection is perfect for my Apple TV.
598.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

599.author: ArtWoman
599.review:
I always new that Bose was a good brand, so I purchased this sound bar to give it a try.

I was NOT DISAPPOINTED! The sound quality is awesome! Who new the tv didn't have to be so loud??? The crispness of sound is unlike anything I have experienced!
599.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

600.author: smoke
600.review_title: Not as great as I expected.
600.review: Bought the Bose soundbar because of reviews and reputation. However the sound was not what I expected. The volume has to be turned up pretty high to get the dialogues and I didn't get the quality I wanted. It's ok for a soundbar.
600.recommend: No, I would not recommend this to a friend

601.author: BillyBOY1952
601.review_title: Excellent sound over the tv speakers!
601.review: Bought this sound bar for better sound to improve bass & all around sound quality. Works great for my 32 inch tv but would definitely buy a much better one for a bigger big screen. Great buy for the price!
601.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

602.author: MrWolf
602.review: Totally lives up to it's Brand name and worth every penny. Only reason this didn't get all 5 stars is no display to see if you are changing volume on bass verses normal sound. Great product from Great Brand.
602.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

603.author: Nana53
603.review: I have gotten used to having a soundbar with my TV as my hearing is not as good as it once was. I knew when I saw the Bose soundbar, that was the one I wanted and it lives up to its name. Great choice.
603.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

604.author: RobW
604.review: I purchased this soundbar for use in our living room, which is not our main teevee. The sound is rich with good highs and mids and decent lows. The sound is not as good as the SoundTouch 300, but for less than half the cost, it is a worthy investment.
604.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

605.author: Gary
605.review: I chose this Bose sound bar mainly for price but I ended up disappointed. It was okay, but didn't provide that "wow factor" I was after. Hardly no bass at all. I ended up taking it back and getting a much larger Bose sound bar with a bass box.
605.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

606.author: Skip
606.review_title: Dissapoitned but did like the remote
606.review: Have a Bose Soundwave happy with it however sound bar did not help clear up dialogue & bass was not impressive. Returned to store & spent additional $100 for a Samsung 3.1 system . Worth the extra cash !
606.recommend: No, I would not recommend this to a friend

607.author: RaleighNC
607.review: The sound is supple for such a small unit. I use the 3.5mm input to connect my Amazon Dot and play Pandora, my briefings, etc. Too much bass can limit out the unit and degrade quality, but this is a solid build and quality product. The remote is massive
607.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

608.author: Jamestown
608.review: This was a purchase for a bedroom. For that purpose, it is perfect. The sound quality is good, it can get a little had to hear dialogue at lower volume. I wish there was a night time setting, or a way to soften the lows a bit more. I would buy it again.
608.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

609.author: PatMac
609.review: I got this soundboard for Christmas. The requirement was to fit a small space and sound good. It met both requirements. You won't have the big bass of a separate bass module but if you have limited space this does extremely well especially for the price.
609.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

610.author: Marilyn
610.review_title: Good sound bar for the price.
610.review: I am really enjoying my new Bose sound bar. It really makes my tv experience much better. The tv speakers have to be so small on the new tv's that one really needs to add a sound bar for maximum quality sound.
610.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

611.author: BESTGUY
611.review: Bought this to use with my 55" LG TV. It's small and powerful. It's a bose so the quality is there. Don't expect to wake the neighbors because its not made for that purpose but is a huge upgrade from the tv speakers. overall am satisfied with it.
611.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

612.author: abnry
612.review: I highly recommend this Bose sound bar it sounds great and the remote works with my other devices. The programming of the remote to operate more than one device at a time was a little bit tricky but after a couple tries it now works as it should.
612.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

613.author: HappyBB
613.review: Extremely easy to set up, low profile is below the tv screen level on our cabinet, and of course the sound is awesome! We now have all Bose only products in our house. Very happy. The spoken word is easy to distinguish from background sounds.
613.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

614.author: Brew
614.review: The sound bar has a great sound and I do love how it is compact and doesn’t take a lot of room. The reason I didn’t give it a five was because I have to turn it on every time I turn on the TV.
614.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

615.author: grhack47
