615.review: We can understand dialogue much better now, which was a problem with our age related, degraded hearing. Universal remote replaces Directv remote, Samsung TV remote and Apple TV remote, another great plus. Has just enough bass, which is adjustable.
615.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

616.author: Jkbolser
616.review: Bought this because of name brand and reviews. Got it home and was disappointed within 48 hours. Sound was ok, had to use the remote as it doesnt sync with tv or cable.. That only was frustrating.. brought it back!
616.recommend: No, I would not recommend this to a friend

617.author: Vegasgodzilla
617.review:
Even though it is inexpensive compared to other Bose systems, you are not getting a sound bar that sounds "cheap". I wish I would have bought one long ago.
Excellent sound quality from their entry level sound bar. After all, it is Bose!
617.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

618.author: Steve
618.review: Bought this sound bar for my son before he leaves for university. Wanted to get him a good quality sound bar for his first place. The Bose Solo 5 did not disappoint. Awesome sound and great base. Liked it do much bought another one for my bedroom
618.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

619.author: Nick
619.review: This sound bar is small but has some awesome sound. The reason for four stars is that there are better ones out there but for the price it puts out more than enough great sound to enhance your listening experience
619.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

620.author: CynKen
620.review: My Mom had a sound bar on her list, but the one she picked out was cheap with poor ratings because she didn't want us spending too much. This one is AMAZING!!! Bose is always high quality and never disappoints. She is happy!!!
620.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

621.author: DoubleT
621.review:
I bought this for the tv, because I had a hard time understanding the speech due to the background music overshadowing it. 
This system does a great job of separating the sounds. The voices are much clearer now.
621.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

622.author: kh1174
622.review: I love this sound bar it has really changed watching movies and it is at a good price. i was not sure about getting the smaller one but am really glad that I did. I really like how you can connect your phone and play music.
622.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

623.author: Henlock
623.review: This is not a high-end soundbar. It is compact and adequate for our needs, but we have had difficulty getting it paired with a remote other than its own. My recommendation below comes with a caveat.
623.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

624.author: Nick
624.review: We purchased this with a new TV. The sound from this Bose is much better than from the TV. We mounted it on the wall just below the TV and it fits in. We could have gone with a larger system with additional speakers but this one met our needs.
624.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

625.author: rapbar
625.review_title: wish I would had gotten it long time ago.
625.review: It makes you feel like your in the theater. Family members hearing with disabilities is able to listen without having it too loud that were all able to watch TV at a comfortable setting thanks to our Bose What a great sound system Love it.
625.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

626.author: Janny
626.review_title: Big sound from a little box!
626.review: This is a very nice soundbar! It has a deep sound quality and makes even commercials sound better. I needed a small soundbar to go with a TV I take on vacation to the mountains. I liked it so much I've hooked it up in the kitchen back at home! Easy set-up!
626.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

627.author: Tilde531
627.review:
Bose never disapoints: realistic surround sound in a compact bar. Excellent bass. 
We are wondering why we took so long to buy this as a sound booster for the tv.
627.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

628.author: Btwells72
628.review: Big sound packed into a small package! This sound bar is easy to set up and I can switch between my TV, phone and other devices. Totally what I would expect from Bose!
628.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

629.author: Mike
629.review_title: Bose sound is great - just plug & play
629.review: Couldn't be easier to use - just plug & play. The great Bose sound comes through every time. Compact design is my preference over all the added speakers and subwoofers, and the price for this Bose unit is hard to beat.
629.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

630.author: Ananth
630.review: when it comes to sound we can close our eyes and get bose products. this soundbar is amazing and it fits my need. good sound quality and base. it comes with universal remote which is also great. i love it. money well spent.
630.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

631.author: ThatGuy
631.review: After several other soundbars not meeting my expectations, I went ahead and spent the extra money for the Bose. It is good quality for a bedroom where strong sub bass is not needed. Voice quality is good and does not require high volume to understand speech.
631.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

632.author: BoocaBill12
632.review_title: Small enough to fir the TV stand perfectly
632.review: Great sound for voices as a person in the household has a hearing proble. I have bought numerous Bose products and all of them are of the highest quality. Very happy so far, will be syncing to my systems and hope that goes well.
632.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

633.author: Stuz
633.review:
The sound from this speaker is very clean as Bose should be. The sound goes up and very slowly. I think it would be nice if it adjusted quicker.
 It comes a with a nice universal remote that was easy to program. It will control the speaker, TV and DVR box.
633.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

634.author: krcgt
634.review: I researched sound bars for weeks, came down to this and a Sony as they both had the highest rated "clear voice" features. Due to size and the fact I specifically did NOT want a sub, I went with the Bose and haven't looked back. Absolute perfection.
634.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

635.author: Steveh
635.review_title: Very nice sound bar for general purpose sound
635.review: Was looking for a solid bar for improved tv audio. Great sound from a small bar. Expected from a Bose. Very good choice for general audio improvement vs standard tv speakers.
635.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

636.author: Tech
636.review: My first sound bar! Great price and quality sound. You can hear every detail, little things in the background that make a difference in how you watch and interpret movies. All without being overbearing and obnoxiously loud.
636.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

637.author: iMac
637.review: From my old 5.1 surround sound to this single bar I was skeptical, but I wasn't disappointed. No mess of all the wires from the old system when this thing is just plug in and go in minutes. Great sound, highly recommend!
637.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

638.author: 1234dag
638.review: I was looking for a medium size sound bar, a built in sub woffer, with known good sound. Bose is always a go to for me and the sound bar proved to work well for my needs. The Bose sound bar has definitely made an improvement for the audio from the TV!
638.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

639.author: Grampy
639.review_title: Great sound in a compact unit.
639.review: The Bose Solo 5 Soundbar produces great sound for the size of the unit. It has very clear sound for speaking and for music. Much better than the TV speakers. It doesn't have a seperate sub-woofer, but doesn't need it.
639.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

640.author: greg455
640.review: Love the sound, only point to make clear is that it does not produce sound separation, but as I use it on my TV in the bedroom its not an important issue. Great sound from BOSE at an affordable price.
640.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

641.author: websphere69
641.review: Very easy to setup and provides a good level of sound for most programs that I watch. The controller was very easy to setup for use with my TV (Samsung Smart TV) and Dish system. For the price it's a very nice unit and I'm very happy with my purchase.
641.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

642.author: Hannah2595
642.review: I was having difficulty hearing my samsung 50" flat screen. I didn't want a huge system with a hugh subwoofer. I didn't need to feel the bass. I just wanted to hear my tv. This works perfectly and its low profile.
642.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

643.author: waldi
643.review_title: It works well but differently than expected
643.review: One must use the Bose remote to turn on the sound, it cannot be programmed into the Comcast remote. This takes getting used to and an extra remote to deal with. The sound is good and one can toggle between speech and music.
643.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

644.author: franknokov
644.review_title: Bose Solo 5 TV Soundbar is a great product
644.review: I did not want to spend a lot of money to improve my TVs sound. So I bought the Bose Solo 5 TV soundbar and have not been disappointed. It comes with a universal remote which is very easy to program. I especially like that I can set the bass level.
644.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

645.author: BobE
645.review: This soundbar has great sound and mounted easily below my wall-mounted tv. Only knock on it is that it doesn't automatically turn on when it gets the sound feed from the tv (via optical cable). You have to manually turn it on each time.
645.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

646.author: DoctorDe
646.review: Initially I wasn't so sure this speaker was worth it but after several weeks and a few movies, I now appreciate it's capabilities. The remote seems like overkill as I can't get it to learn my RokuTV but otherwise great soundBar.
646.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

647.author: DRon123
647.review: For the size, this small soundbat delivers more than expected. Voice clarity is great, and music too - both far superior to the TV audio system. And to top it all off, it’s a Bose unit at a reasonable cost.
647.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

648.author: phfranck
648.review: I am disappointed in the fact that I have to wait 1 minute to get the sound from the TV to the sound bar. The salesperson did not tell us about this. BUT for $150.00 I can buy a dandy remote that will take care of this. Not in this lifetime.
648.recommend: No, I would not recommend this to a friend

649.author: Fran
649.review: When you want good quality you buy a Bose. I own a few Bose products and I have never been disappointed. That’s why when shopping I always look for Bose. It definitely made a difference watching TV
649.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

650.author: BestBuyBuyer
650.review: I do like this unit, as I have a lot of Bose products. However, this little one lacks bass. I recommend for small rooms, maybe for hosting, definitely not for a group movie night. This one is in my kitchen/dining room.
650.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

651.author: galahad
651.review: incredible sound from small bar, good for dialogue as it is enha ced, cannot use as center speaker though as there are no speaker connectors, bluetooth enabled
651.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

652.author: Patricia
652.review: LOVE the sound from this product. Have only used it for a few days but am really enjoying the quality of sound. Also, it is a shorter unit than some sound bars and thus fits in the area we needed to put it more easily. Seems to be a great product.
652.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

653.author: SparkyTX
653.review_title: Not as loud as it should be
653.review: I have the volume maxed out and it is not much louder then my TV which was not loud enough. So the for the reason I purchased it its not much of a benefit. I do bluetooth it to my iphone and it does provide slightly better audio that way.
653.recommend: No, I would not recommend this to a friend

654.author: Yayyyyyy
654.review_title: Good for someone that wants simple
654.review: This sound bar sounds great but if you just need something for a very nice small room. Do your research before purchasing. Besides that it works well & sounds great
654.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

655.author: dav31d
655.review_title: Excellent sound quality for reasonable price
655.review: BOSE Solo 5 sound bar has excellent sound quality yet takes a minimal amount of space; is extremely easy to hook up and use. Recommend it's consideration when shopping for an external sound system/device to accommodate TVs with subpar sound systems.
655.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

656.author: larrytwist
656.review: We already had Bose audio in a larger room and really enjoy the enhancement it adds to watching tv. The new soundbar is in a moderate sized bedroom, and it is also excellent. The sound and bass is amazing considering the size of the soundbar.
656.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

657.author: RichMaryland
657.review: I have a TV that has very poor sound quality and I bought this soundbar. The hookup was very straightforward. However, the sound quality was barely better than the sound from the TV. I returned this product.
657.recommend: No, I would not recommend this to a friend

658.author: Riskmanager
658.review: My wife and I both love this soundbar. It has clariefied the spoken words, and the "Dialogue" button works wonders for the news and other shows. Highly recommend this soundbar, which replaces a Polk which we have used for the last seven years.
658.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

659.author: Tata
659.review: I first bought Bose speaker system in 2007 and really was I impressed beyond my best expectation, it was more than love at first sight. My recent purchase adds one more useful feature - dialogue mode that I widely used during presidential debates.
659.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

660.author: Shead
660.review: Bought new bedroom TV, and wanted better sound. This truly enhances TV experience with clear, full dialogue-when I turn sound bar off, I cringe. I believe the remote may work as universal remote? Have not had time to research/ read up
660.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

661.author: JayL
661.review: was looking for a speaker that had great depth in sound for my tv. I literally would have to turn up my tv volume to 70 because I could not hear it once my a/c was on. Now with just a few clicks on of the Bose speaker the sound is so rich. Love it!
661.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

662.author: Bre57
662.review: We purchased a new 82" TV and this soundbar for our living room. Don't let the size full you, this little device has a powerful sound. Bose does not disappoint, and we couldn't be happier.
662.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

663.author: Deltapapa
663.review: This product provides great sound at a low cost. I got it for my wife for Christmas because she loves listening to music. She wanted a boon box, but this is far better than that. Not only has a great sound, but also has many nice features.
663.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

664.author: claphead
664.review: These superthin TVS have OK sound so a soundbar is usually necessary. This one is small but sounds great. Has a button on the remote (speech bubble) for enhancing voices (news, sports). That way you can have a setting for movies and news/sports.
664.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

665.author: PKTJ
665.review: Bought this for my sister-in-law as a graduation gift! She loves it!! The fact it connects so seamlessly to bluetooth and the sound quality is fantastic no matter what we listen to! She loves it so much we are considering investing in one ourselves!
665.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

666.author: Jovi1Kenobi
666.review: I bought this in August, and it's now November and it's already stopped working as it should. The bass isn't there anymore, and the sounds cuts in and out. Disappointed in this Bose product. I guess I should have just paid more for a better one.
666.recommend: No, I would not recommend this to a friend

667.author: Duce
667.review: I have only had the sound bar about a week, but I am loving it!! My one complaint, the remote is huge, bulky, and heavy. Additionally, it is suppose to be a universal remote (which I'm sure it can be) but so far it is not accepting the Sony TV codes.
667.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

668.author: Defience
668.review: Checked out Several brands one was LG because we have LG tv but when I saw the Bose was a single piece no extra to set on side. My husband was happy. Bought figured if didn't work could return it! Works great! Bose is a great product!!
668.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

669.author: AliBoJali
669.review: Takes a minute getting used to the remote that is obnoxiously big for the size of the soundbar. All in all it produces great sound for such a small device. Makes watching movies and sports much more enjoyable.
669.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

670.review_title: Good for small room or bedroom
670.review: This is a good soundbar for small room or a bedroom. I think the remote is the best part of the package as you can program it to work your tv, cable box, and dvd player which takes four remotes down to one. Not enough bass for a bigger room.
670.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

671.author: Cliffj
671.review: I bought another sound bar before buying the one made by Bose, but returned it when it failed within the first few days. Glad I bought the Bose. Even though it is smaller than the other one,it produces excellent sound. I couldn't be happier.
671.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

672.author: Rudye
672.review: Bose, in my opinion is vastly over rated!. Sound is fair at best. Little or no bass on low end. Also, hard to sync with remote. It has to be lined perfect with tv & remote to not get out of sync.
672.recommend: No, I would not recommend this to a friend

673.author: Timmy
673.review: This is a really good sound bar without needing a subwoofer. I live in an apartment, and this provides great sound without booming the floor. Very nice universal remote!
673.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

674.author: Jfntnya
674.review: Brought my Mom shopping for her birthday to find a soundbar for her new tv. We both thought this one sounded the best & it was decently priced. She loves it & it sounds better in her home than it did in the store!! Great product!!
674.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

675.author: Nana
675.review: After reading the reviews on the Bose Soundbar, I purchased it in the Valdosta Ga. store. The associates in the store were very helpful and explained everything in detail that I needed to know. Sound is awesome! Very satisfied.
675.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

676.author: W84IT
676.review: I no longer wanted to have speakers all over my living room for surround sound and this is the answer! Sounds great and takes up no space! not to mention I can pair my phone to via Bluetooth! Goodbye wires hello wireless.
676.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

677.author: Gratt410
677.review: I own a true surround Bose system for my living room and decided to try a soundbar for my bedroom. I was surprised when this small bar filled the room with the perfect amount of bass and treble! Great value! Bose knows how to make a great product
677.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

678.author: ALok
678.review_title: Great sound quality for the price
678.review: Of all the sound bars out there in the market I would recommend this to anyone who is looking for reliable quality of sound (Bose) at a great price. My movie watching experience has changed completely with Bose® - Solo 5 TV Soundbar.
678.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

679.author: bongor
679.review: The sound is great and the sleek, compact design fits anywhere. My only suggeation to Bose would be to add a dialog setting. It’s not enough to have touch-button bass control. Otherwise beautiful sound, great price.
679.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

680.author: Jazzi
680.review: We are repeat Bose sound bar buyers. we were very pleased with our first for a long time . The new one has great sound and takes up less space. The only quirk is a garbled voice that comes through unexpectedly at times.
680.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

681.author: Roni
681.review: Overall, sound is great. Even better now that I've also purchased the sub with it. I can't get it to work through the HDMI(ARC) cable but it's works through the optical cable. Too busy to trouble shoot with Bose but I will someday.
681.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

682.author: JohnR
682.review_title: Excellent sound bar for my tV
682.review: Previously I was using a Samsung sound bar and having issues with it's inability to stay on HD. Purchased the Bose sound bar and have not had any problems. It is a great purchase and delivers excellent sound, as does all Bose speakers.
682.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

683.author: KKCB
683.review: Sound bars can be pretty expensive. Snagged one of these on sale around Christmas. Does a good job helping perfect the sound on my big screen but is not going to give you a surround "sound" without the purchase of additional speakers
683.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

684.author: Dealfinder
684.review: I find I have to keep turning this down (my kids turn it up) because the sound fills the room! The room it’s in is very open 19x30 tile floor. Acoustics are great with this small sound bar!
684.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

685.author: f250
685.review: does cost a lot of money, but sometimes you get what you pay for, a lot louder then built in tv speakers, with the added bass and sound quality, small packaging works perfect mounted under 55" tv. Wall Mount is a BOSE WB-120 sold separately.
685.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

686.author: floppydog
686.review: This Bose sound bar is outstanding. I would highly recommended it to anyone looking to improve the sound quality of their new TV. It has no subwoofer which is exactly what I was looking for and it works great.
686.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

687.author: Jak9
687.review: I replaced my sound bar with the Bose Solo 5 and am very happy with the upgrade. My previous sound bar had a wireless subwoofer. The Solo 5 does great without a subwoofer and I think the sound carries very well in the living room.
687.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

688.author: TCag
688.review_title: Wish it had a bit more bass sound
688.review: At the store it was playing a movie and sound was nice and deep and great bass sounding. In my apartment connected to TV and watching regular TV it's much better than the TV speakers, not as much bass overall that I was hoping for.
688.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

689.author: RJay
689.review: Have only had it a couple of days, but it is great for a small room. The sound quality is excellent and it was so easy to install. Plug in, hook up optical, turn on. Small, compact and makes a huge difference. Only fault is the remote is huge.
689.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

690.author: Mikeyt22
690.review: Bought this for my Dad for Christmas last year. It’s obviously not as good as surround sound, but this sound bar definitely does what it’s supposed to do.
690.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

691.author: Grockle
691.review: I bought this sound bar for use in my motor home. It is much better than the tv audio. So for this application it is good. But if used in my home, then I would select a sound bar with a sub woofer.
691.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

692.author: Luckeeleo
692.review: Great full range sound and bass boosting. Enhances dialogue over music and Special effects unlike most surround sound systems. Easy to connect Bluetooth with tablets, but still having trouble connecting Lenovo laptop with Windows 10.
692.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

693.author: PHIL
693.review_title: GREAT SPEAKER FOR OVERALL SOUND QUALITY
693.review:
THE HIGHLIGHT OF THE BOSE SYSTEM IS THE DIALOGUE CONTROL. WITH THE BACKGROUND SOUND (NOISE) ON TV PROGRAMS, THIS FUNCTION LITERARY DROPS THE NOISE DOWN AND AMPLIFIES THE DIALOGUE. FINALLY YOU CAN UNDERSTAND 
WHAT IS BEING SAID.
693.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

694.author: Goodeye
694.review: I recently bought a 5.1 surround to help with my trouble hearing dialogue on my TV. This Bose Solo 5 was superior to the 5.1 and dialogue is now easier to understand. Bose once again comes through.
694.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

695.author: Mommom
695.review: I have had a couple different sound bars and this one tops all of them. The annunciation coming out of it is crystal clear and the physical size is so much smaller. It's everything and more what you would expect from Bose.
695.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

696.author: Mrsjcox
696.review: I wish they'd had this before I bought my blue ray/smart/surround sound system. This is so awesome. The sound quality is great and it's not very expensive. We should have stuck with Bose and after purchasing this sound bar we definitely will.
696.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

697.author: Kiki
697.review: A great, compact soundboard with wonderful sound. Love it because 1) it has a dialogue mode so words are much clearer 2) it was reasonably priced and 3) it was a trusted Bose product.
697.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

698.author: maggieboop
698.review: We bought the same sound bar last year for our larger television in our family room and we loved it. This new one was placed in our bedroom for the new television there and it is just as fantastic as the first one!
698.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

699.author: ragman1bear
699.review: I bought this because of the reviews from other people who wanted a speaker that allows you to hear voices better, and this is the speaker to have. Not only are voices much clearer, but the overall sound and even the bass is excellent.
699.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

700.author: jtpikka
700.review: Time to replace my old five piece speaker system (generic brand), went with Bose because of all the reviews and quality. Doesn't sound anything like the store demo and cannot adjust bass as it says you can. Not impressed.
700.recommend: No, I would not recommend this to a friend

701.author: townwalker
701.review:
Purchased it to get greater volume since my new Samsung Smart T.V. releases the volume down toward the base it sits on. I was very disappointed that it really wasn't much better than what I had originally.
Should have bought Wireless earphones.
701.recommend: No, I would not recommend this to a friend

702.author: Brickhus
702.review: This soundbar was by far easier to use than the Samsung one I bought and returned. Took me all of 5 minutes after opening the contents, which consisted of the soundbar and 1 multi-function remote control plus wiring connections.
702.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

703.author: Joey
703.review_title: The Vacuumn is light and easy to use.
703.review: Very happy with the rechargeable dyson vacuumn. I use it every day. It is easy and light to use up and downstairs. I wish the battery would last a little longer. Very happy with the TV. Already had one and was very pleased with it.
703.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

704.author: ARoss
704.review: Easy to set up, great sound!! Purchased for my not so tech-savy mom and she loves the universal remote and is so pleased with this product. Also got Guardians of the Galaxy 2 to test out and it was theater quality sound.
704.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

705.author: Webster
705.review: We saw this soundbar and thought it may be too small. Wow, was I wrong! This little sound bar packs more punnch than most other brands twice the size. I have one word for this soundbar, BOSE!
705.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

706.author: Bf9855150
706.review: My brother has a 70” tv in a huge room. He purchased Samsung speakers with a subwoofer the room made the bass and voice on listenable. These bose have a button for improved speech sound. Problem solved.
706.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

707.author: Hunter
707.review: These are minimally better than stock tv speakers. My main reason for buying them were that my stock speakers did blow out, and the only other option was buying a new tv. The sound functions have minimal effect on the overall sound.
707.recommend: No, I would not recommend this to a friend

708.author: Palp
708.review: The sound is great. We got it because several family members have some hearing issues. Now we do not have to turn up the volume as loud as before. It is a terrific purchase and I highly recommend it. You will not regret your purchase.
708.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

709.author: dmv92117
709.review: This sound bar looks and sounds great. Easy to use and you can connect via bluetooth with many devices. The sound is deep and with the bass feature you will not miss having a separate bass box on your floor.
709.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

710.author: Fmjh
710.review: This speaker is an excellent companion to my new TV that has a great picture but a poor speaker. I like that it is all in one piece. The speech function is a great feature. It can clarify words that are a bit difficult to hear.
710.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

711.author: SkittleFartz
711.review: This speaker is great and allows me to do so many things besides increase the volume on my TV I like the fact that I can connect it to my iPad wirelessly through Bluetooth and have crystal clear sound for the price it's a great value
711.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

712.author: Terry
712.review: Easy to install and had it up and working in short area. Sound is descent and definitely better than what the TV is capable of but nothing mind blowing here. Works as a Bluetooth speaker too so one more place where I can blast my music
712.recommend: No, I would not recommend this to a friend

713.author: BW562
713.review: Product for me sound bar in large living room and without work however the small fireman or small bedroom couple of square feet sound comes out and supposedly it’s
713.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

714.author: MrSquiggles
714.review: I know there isn’t a subwoofer, so the sound is actually quite good considering, but I would have like a little more bass. Good speaker for the price.
714.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

715.author: DanMc
715.review: Sounds great and is easy to connect with supplied wires. The only gripe is it doesn't have any buttons. This is only an issue when your brother loses your remote and there is no way to turn it on!
715.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

716.author: Driz
716.review: The sound from this speaker system is awesome for my bedroom. It sounds way better than the tv. I would recommend it to anyone looking to upgrade sound in the bedroom. Might not be enough for the family room
716.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

717.author: JP40
717.review: Sound Bar is average. It has slighly better sound than directly out of the TV. The sound has some more depth but it is no surround sound. I am going to purchase other speakers to complete the sound experience that I am looking for.
717.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

718.author: MacaRalphy
718.review_title: Nice size speaker, not too big or small
718.review: Bluetooth music feature on this speaker is fantastic. Only thing is its not real loud. I was expecting for a bose speaker, it would be louder. Very pricey. I feel like we paid to much. Great size, cute & nice to look at. It's okay I'd say!
718.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

719.author: Blondie44
719.review: Have been bugging my husband for a sound bar for ages! Finally broke down and we got the Bose. Reason he likes it just one unit not 2 pieces. Sound is great, looks like part of set and we can hear! YAY! Happy we got the Bose!
719.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

720.author: JSutton0402
720.review: I was so over having a huge subwoofer sitting in my livingroom. I came across this Bose sound bar and decided to buy it. I’m so glad I did! We will even be buying one for our bedroom in the near future!
720.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

721.author: redteapot
721.review: I bought this product based on the reputation of Bose. The sound quality is excellent, especially music. It is sometimes difficult to use the master remote and keep all equipment synched up (TV, cable box & Bose bar).
721.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

722.author: Momof10
722.review: We wanted a speaker that would be off the floor so that we wouldn't bother the downstairs neighbor too much with sound filtering through the floor. It has great sound and I love the Bluetooth capability for my phone with iTunes.
722.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

723.author: phoenixlucky
723.review: The sound bar is the perfect fit for our tv and console. The sound bar fits easily in front of the tv and provides excellent sound. Any dialog is easy to understand and it is also great for watching sports.
723.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

724.author: wesmapes
724.review_title: It sounds good but I expected more
724.review: I looked at several different sound bars but settled on this one because it was a Bose. I had high expectations because of the name but felt that the other brands would have been just as good for the money.
724.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

725.author: DrGeorge
725.review_title: Great sound... for TV or stereo!
725.review: I love Bose speakers and am thrilled with the Solo 5 TV sound system. It was easy to set up and provides better sound than my previous "theater" speakers. Also, I use it without the TV to listen to music from my iPhone. Again, great sound!
725.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

726.author: Ydoctor
726.review_title: Sounds so much better than our previous speakers
726.review: We received qualified assistance when purchasing this product while price comparing within the store and were happy to find that this product was actually on sale . It is higher quality and a name brand item for only a few dollars more.
726.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

727.author: Bobby
727.review: I love the sound, especially the option where the clarity of spoken words are enhanced. However, the remote feels awkward in the hand (can't tell which way is up) and the buttons don't light up. Not very cool when room lighting is low.
727.recommend: No, I would not recommend this to a friend

728.author: Dutch

731.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

732.author: EFMC
732.review: The BOSE sound bar has much greater clarity than my previous one. It is much easier to hear the dialogue for any program on any channel. Very happy w/ this prduct so far.
732.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

733.author: Bose
733.review: This Bose soundbar has excellent sound quality. Also great capability features with the Bluetooth so I can link not only my TV to it but also when I want to listen to music, I can Bluetooth to my phone.

734.author: Tet68vet

734.review: If your new TV has a weak sound system (probably) and you are viewing in a smallish space this is the unit for you. No heart pounding bass to drive you out of the house. Great voice enhancement.

735.author: Stevie
735.review: This thing is perfect if you want to upgrade your flat screens tinny speakers, and want it done quickly, easily, and with just one piece instead of multiple pieces. Bose has always been my favorite and again they do not dissapoint.

736.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

737.author: BMPH
737.review: I am very happy with this 5.1 sound bar center speaker. It is one of my best purchases I have done latelly. The sound quality is great. It is easy to mount and to hook up. I do recomend it. Great price. It is a BOSE, it is the best.
737.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

738.author: Skidplate

738.review: After reviewing and listening to numerous sound bars we chose the Bose. We listened to the Bose in the store and we're totally surprised when we got the unit home and it sounded 10 times better then in the store.
738.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

739.author: Kenny
739.review: This is a great product as all of Bose products are. The only issue I had was that the volume doesn't get LOUD. I like to use for music as well .
739.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

740.author: clg88
740.review: The solo 5 has sound that is lively and natural sound bouncing all around you. Helps you think and feel like you are there live! I love the button for the talk and news show. So quick and easy.
740.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

741.author: nmkm
741.review: My husband bought this due to our old tv speakers not being very loud. It makes the tv viewing much more pleasurable as we can hear it now in the large room we have. Delivers great sound in large spaces.
741.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

742.author: yardbird253
742.review_title: GREAT ADDITION TO ANY SMALL ENTERTAINMENT SYSTEM
742.review: For the small footprint this little Bose speaker is an excellent choice for anyone wanting to add to their 42in or smaller TV for better than expected sound. Great for adding to a bedroom or small living space.
742.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

743.author: Haleyb01
743.review: Just what I have been looking for, a compact size sound bar. Great sound. Perfect for my bedroom. Sound not over powering, will not disturb household. Love it!!! Wouldn’t expect anything less from Bose!!!!
743.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

744.author: pppkkk3ii
744.review: Apparently, for better sound, you need to spend more money. Its sound has a little lack of base due to its small size. Because it is BOSE, it provides qualified mid-range sound so good for general purpose.
744.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

745.author: Chrisg84

745.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

746.author: MMoran1977
746.review: I bought this for my bedroom. I didn't want the base and something big. This was the smallest soundbar with the highest quality i could find and i was not disappointed. Easy set up and the sound filled my bedroom. Great job Bose!
746.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

747.author: Dwight
747.review: I needed a sound bar that had the capability of providing clear dialog. This is the bomb!! Every speaker in my house is Bose. I have had nothing but for over 40 years because of the sound quality. This product is no exception!
747.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

748.author: Francisco
748.review: Our TV has horrible speakers and wanted something to make conversation easier to hear. This soundbar is great and the best part is it works with my xfinity remote so we don't need to worry about juggling multiple remotes.
748.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

749.author: Canny
749.review: My concern was to Improve the quality of the tv sound during the time that the air conditioning fan, which is near the tv, is running. The solo helps some with that. It greatly improves the sound overall.
749.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

751.author: BNWoody
751.review: We were looking for a gift for a hard to please son. This was the perfect gift. Connection and set up was easy peasy. Connects to his phone and he plays music all day. I have multiple Bose equipment but this one is very nice!
751.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

756.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

758.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

759.author: Ncb1

759.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

761.author: backuplus

765.author: Caro

768.author: Integrity

After all I put up with trying to get this to work would not recommend this product!!!!!
772.recommend: No, I would not recommend this to a friend

The Bose sound system was perfect for our TV. great sound and fits
right in front of 60" screen without screen obstruction. Great investment with easy set up and instructions.

Highly recommend.

801.author: ZACH

Great sound, and not too big. I do have an LG TV 49" and needed to lift it up a little bit so it would not affect the remote signal.

808.author: James

810.author: Judy
810.review_title: Everything is so much clearer with the Bose.

812.author: Lynnski

813.author: Rbryanc

814.author: Franchise1

818.author: Cara

820.review: It's just the right size for our bedroom. Great sound with the 'Bass' setting. I like the crisp news and speech that is enhanced by using bubble button on remote. Great Bose product at affordable cost.

Is a sound bar ideal for improving the speakers of a TV. It may not be so good as a speaker in a party room because of its low power.
It turns out to be expensive, but in its range seems to be the best.

823.author: JandH1989
